translation.en: [boy] So, there my grandfather was. Alone, injured,
translation.zh: 当时我爷爷一个人 受了伤

translation.en: scared, in space.
translation.zh: 很害怕 在太空中

translation.en: And the only way he could survive until his crew came back to rescue him
translation.zh: 要坚持到队员们回来营救他

translation.en: was by growing vegetables… in his own poop.
translation.zh: 唯一的办法是用自己的大便种蔬菜

translation.en: OK, Kevin... I'm gonna stop you right there.
translation.zh: 好的 凯文 我得让你停了

translation.en: I'm having a hard time believing this is true.
translation.zh: 很难相信你说的这些是真的

translation.en: Mrs. Westenfeldt, I don't know what would make you think--
translation.zh: 韦斯特费尔德太太不知你为什么会这么觉得

translation.en: Well, for one thing, it's the plot of The Martian.
translation.zh: 首先 这是《火星救援》的桥段

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on. -[boy 2] Enough already, Kev.
translation.zh: 拜托 够了 凯文

translation.en: Where do you think they got the idea?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们的灵感是从哪儿来的呢？

translation.en: ♪ No more hangin' round Wonderin' what to do in town ♪
translation.zh: NETFLIX 出品

translation.en: [whispers] My God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 噢 天哪！

translation.en: Clancy?
translation.zh: 克兰西

translation.en: Is your head OK?
translation.zh: 你的头没事吧？

translation.en: -Uh, hey, Travis. -[chuckles] Uh, yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 你好 特拉维斯 嗯 我没事

translation.en: So, I'm having this party tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚开派对

translation.en: My parents are out of town. You should come by. Here, um…
translation.zh: 我父母出城去了 你来吧 这样

translation.en: -Give me your number, so I can-- -Oh, um, I don't have that.
translation.zh: -你的号码给我 我就可以…-噢 我没有

translation.en: -You don't have a number? -No. [chuckles] I don't have a phone.
translation.zh: -你没有号码？-是的 我没有手机

translation.en: -[chuckles] -My mom won't let me.
translation.zh: 我妈不允许

translation.en: She thinks social media's where serial killers
translation.zh: 她觉得社交媒体上有连环杀手

translation.en: and college admissions get their information about you.
translation.zh: 觉得大学招生处是从社交媒体了解你的信息

translation.en: [chuckles] That's… That's really weird.
translation.zh: 好奇怪

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -[girl] Hey, Trav. -Hey, Emma.
translation.zh: -你好 特拉-你好 艾玛

translation.en: Your party is going to be wicked awesome.
translation.zh: 你的派对一定会非常棒

translation.en: Oh, and shouldn't you be in rehearsal, band nerd?
translation.zh: 还有 你不要参加乐队排练吗？

translation.en: [Travis] Don't worry about them. They're annoying.
translation.zh: 哎 别管她们 很烦人

translation.en: Hope I see you tonight.
translation.zh: 希望今晚能见到你

translation.en: [teacher] Louisa, thank you. Violin sounded excellent.
translation.zh: 路易莎 非常感谢 小提琴拉得非常好

translation.en: Alright, guys, practice, practice. [clapping]
translation.zh: 好的 各位 多练习

translation.en: Alright. Bye, kids.
translation.zh: 好的 再见 孩子们

translation.en: -Great job today, Clancy. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -今天表现非常好 克兰西-谢谢

translation.en: Did you finish your... your audition tape?
translation.zh: 试镜带录好了吗？

translation.en: Um, not yet.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: Not yet? Clancy, the application deadline is in two weeks.
translation.zh: 还没有？克兰西还有两周 申请就截止了

translation.en: I know, I… [sighs] I filmed one last night, but I deleted it,
translation.zh: 我知道 昨晚我录了一遍不过我删掉了

translation.en: 'cause at ends, I was a little pitchy, and the high notes were flat. I…
translation.zh: 因为最后有点不太好高音调太平 我…

translation.en: -I just need-- -Hey, listen... Make the tape this weekend, get it to me by Monday.
translation.zh: 哎 听我说 本周末把带子录好周一给我

translation.en: That's it. You got this.
translation.zh: 就这样 你没问题的

translation.en: -OK. -OK. You got this.
translation.zh: -好-好 你没问题的

translation.en: -[Clancy giggles] -Kids class. You wanna practice? Fine.
translation.zh: 孩子们 要好好练习 好的

translation.en: Ooh, you look good!
translation.zh: 你很不错啊！

translation.en: Yeah, I didn't... didn't think I'd see you here. You look fierce. [growls]
translation.zh: 对 没想到在这里见到你你非常棒啊

translation.en: [boy 1 chuckles] Nice moves, loser.
translation.zh: 跳得不错 笨蛋

translation.en: -This is so good, man. -[Kevin] It was just a joke.
translation.zh: -太棒了 兄弟-开玩笑罢了

translation.en: -[boy 1] Where you going? Get back here. -[Kevin] Leave me alone.
translation.zh: -去哪里？别这样 兄弟-别跟着我 别走啊 回来

translation.en: Where you going? Come on. Give me one more move.
translation.zh: 你去哪里？别这样 再跳一段

translation.en: I knew you were there the whole time. It was just a joke.
translation.zh: 我早就知道你在里面就是开玩笑罢了

translation.en: -[boy 1] Youre gonna be famous. -Hey.
translation.zh: 你出名了 孩子

translation.en: -Everything OK here, boys? -Yep. All good.
translation.zh: -没事吧 孩子们？-嗯 没事

translation.en: [boy 2] Sure.
translation.zh: （晚餐值日志愿者）

translation.en: Alright. Why don't you head back to lunch?
translation.zh: 好的 那去吃午餐吧？

translation.en: Not so fast, you three. You're eighth graders.
translation.zh: 慢点 你们三个 你们八年级了

translation.en: You think you should be picking on younger kids?
translation.zh: 真觉得应该欺负比你们小的孩子吗？

translation.en: What are you gonna do about it?
translation.zh: 你能怎么样？

translation.en: Oh... Jeez, well.
translation.zh: 噢 天哪！好吧

translation.en: I guess, first I would find out who your parents are.
translation.zh: 首先 我大概可以查查你们父母是谁

translation.en: Then I'd find out where they live.
translation.zh: 然后查查他们住在那里

translation.en: And one night,
translation.zh: 一天晚上

translation.en: when you're all sound asleep, I'd cut a small hole in their brake lines.
translation.zh: 等你们都熟睡了我可以在他们的刹车线上切一个小洞

translation.en: So, one minute you've got brakes, and the next,
translation.zh: 这样一开始可以刹车 但是之后

translation.en: you're rolling right through a stop sign
translation.zh: 在停车标记前就刹不住了

translation.en: and getting smashed into little, unrecognizable pieces by oncoming traffic.
translation.zh: 然后被路上的车撞得粉碎

translation.en: Oops! You missed lunch.
translation.zh: 噢 你们错过午餐了

translation.en: Better not be late for class.
translation.zh: 最好上课别迟到

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -[boy 1] Guys, wait up!
translation.zh: 哎 等等！

translation.en: -Hey, Dad! -Hey!
translation.zh: -哎 爸！-哎！

translation.en: Hey, guys!
translation.zh: 哎 你们好 周五啦 感谢神！

translation.en: TGIF! [chuckles] How was school?
translation.zh: 哎 你们好 周五啦 感谢神！ -学校里怎么样？-挺好

translation.en: -Did anything interesting happen? -[both] No.
translation.zh: -发生什么有趣的事了吗？-没有

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Dad, you really brought those weird finger things to school?
translation.zh: 你真的把这古怪的手指玩意儿带到学校来了？

translation.en: Uh, no, I didn't bring these with me to school, OK?
translation.zh: 我没带来学校 好吧？

translation.en: [chuckles] I have a spare set in the car.
translation.zh: 只是在车上放了一个备用罢了

translation.en: -That's even weirder. -Kevin, can you tell your sister
translation.zh: -那就更奇怪了-凯文 能不能告诉你姐

translation.en: that being a pastry chef
translation.zh: 做糕点主厨需要巨大的手指力量？

translation.en: requires enormous finger strength for kneading dough?
translation.zh: 做糕点主厨需要巨大的手指力量？ 要捏面团 看看这肌肉

translation.en: -Look at that muscle. [groans] -Yeah, look at it. He's the finger ninja.
translation.zh: 要捏面团 看看这肌肉 对 看看 他是手指忍者

translation.en: -Hola. What's goin' on, Finch family? -Hi.
translation.zh: -你们好 还好吧 芬奇一家？-你好

translation.en: [girl] Thanks for always letting me catch a ride, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh: 谢谢你顺路带我 芬奇先生

translation.en: -[Dad] You're basically family, Mim. -Don't be a perv! Close the door.
translation.zh: 没事 咱们基本上是一家人了 小米 别吐出来 关门

translation.en: Well, looks like we're all here. Let's hit it, Dad.
translation.zh: 看来都到齐了 出发吧 爸

translation.en: I'd love to, but I can't jump the line.
translation.zh: 我也想开 不过在排队 凯文

translation.en: Yeah, it's just, idling like this is super bad for the environment.
translation.zh: 爸 这样缓行对环境特别不好

translation.en: Oh... Do you have to take a number two?
translation.zh: 你要不要上个大号？

translation.en: Dad, what? No!
translation.zh: 爸 什么啊？不要！

translation.en: No, I'm just saying. I know you don't like going in school,
translation.zh: 我就是问问嘛我知道你不愿意在学校上

translation.en: and I remembered last year,
translation.zh: 我就是问问嘛我知道你不愿意在学校上 我记得去年你憋了五天

translation.en: when you held it in for five days, and finally...
translation.zh: 我记得去年你憋了五天 后来拉的时候真的是…

translation.en: Dad, stop! You're killing me!
translation.zh: 爸 别说了！你要我命啊！

translation.en: I'm killing you? You were killing us, when you--
translation.zh: 我要你命？是你要我们的命 你…

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 哎！

translation.en: -Mr. Finch… -Hey, Mrs. W.
translation.zh: -芬奇先生-你好 韦太太

translation.en: You know what I just realized?
translation.zh: 我刚发现韦太太和韦斯特费尔德太太

translation.en: Mrs. W and Mrs. Westenfeldt have the same amount of syllables,
translation.zh: 我刚发现韦太太和韦斯特费尔德太太 读起来花的时间也差不多

translation.en: so me calling you "Mrs. W"
translation.zh: 读起来花的时间也差不多

translation.en: doesn't save any time. -Isn't that funny? -Ha-ha.
translation.zh: 是不是很好笑？

translation.en: -She doesn't care. -It's funny to me.
translation.zh: -爸 她没觉得好笑-我觉得挺好笑

translation.en: Mr. Finch, Kevin gave a very interesting oral presentation
translation.zh: 芬奇先生 今天社会学课上 凯文作了非常有趣的演讲

translation.en: in social studies class today.
translation.zh: 凯文作了非常有趣的演讲

translation.en: Really? It was a project on their family history
translation.zh: -真的？-是关于家族史的内容

translation.en: and Kevin had fascinating things to say about your family.
translation.zh: 凯文说了许多关于你们家族的奇妙事

translation.en: Oh, well--
translation.zh: 噢 嗯…

translation.en: And how they were a troupe of traveling Russian acrobats turned astronauts
translation.zh: 一群旅行的俄国杂技演员变的宇航员

translation.en: -NASA trained for secret space missions. -That--
translation.zh: 由美国宇航军训练用于参加秘密太空任务

translation.en: Kevin tends to live in his own imaginary little world,
translation.zh: -这…-凯文喜欢活在自己想象的小世界中

translation.en: -which can be great… -Yes.
translation.zh: -这也很好-对

translation.en: …except when it comes at the expense of participating in real life.
translation.zh: 但是不能放到现实生活中来

translation.en: Except then.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So... I will give him the weekend to redo his project.
translation.zh: 所以 我会给他周末的时间让他重做项目

translation.en: -That seems fair. -[Mrs. W] He can present again on Monday.
translation.zh: -挺公平-他可以周一重新演讲

translation.en: -Hm. -Well, I appreciate that. And she's gone.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 她走了

translation.en: Alright. Everybody, buckle up, the correct way.
translation.zh: 好的 大家系好安全带 正确系带

translation.en: -[Kevin] Who puts ketchup on pizza? -[Dad] OK, Kevin. [laughs]
translation.zh: -在她的披萨上放番茄酱-好的 凯文

translation.en: -Hey, hon! -Hey, guys.
translation.zh: -你好 亲爱的-你们好

translation.en: [Dad] You should've seen me. I was a tiger in the carpool line.
translation.zh: 你要是看见就好了今天我在共乘车道可威风了

translation.en: [Mom] You are the king of carpool.
translation.zh: 你是共乘车道之王

translation.en: [Dad] Guess what. I had a chat with Mrs. W.
translation.zh: 今天我又和韦太太有趣地聊了一下

translation.en: -Kevin's at it again. -Kevin, are you telling tales again?
translation.zh: 今天我又和韦太太有趣地聊了一下 凯文 你是不是又编故事了？

translation.en: -How was lunch duty today? -[Mom] You know, same as usual.
translation.zh: -哎 今天午餐值日怎么样？-你知道的 和平常一样

translation.en: Actually, an 8th grader got into trouble with his phone. I had--
translation.zh: 一个八年级生用手机惹了点麻烦所以我只能…

translation.en: Wow! An 8th grader has a phone, and I don't.
translation.zh: 哇！八年级生有手机 我却没有

translation.en: Mom, can we talk about this? Please. It's time. I need a phone.
translation.zh: -来 朋友-妈 能谈一下这事吗？ 求你了 是时候了 我需要手机

translation.en: I'm literally the only one in my grade without one. I'm a total freak.
translation.zh: 我真的是全年级唯一没有手机的人我成了彻底的怪人

translation.en: Just 'cause you don't have a phone, doesn't make you a freak.
translation.zh: 噢 没有手机并不会使你成为怪人

translation.en: Mmm... It's not like "sit with the counselor at lunch 'cause you stink like cheese" freak, but--
translation.zh: 虽然算不上像臭奶酪一样臭那么离谱

translation.en: You know, in high school we had this foreign exchange student
translation.zh: -但是…-我们高中有个交换生 有奶酪的臭味

translation.en: who smelled like cheese. We called him Frankie Fromage.
translation.zh: -但是…-我们高中有个交换生 有奶酪的臭味 我们叫他奶酪弗兰基

translation.en: -[Mom laughs] -Ew, Dad! Mom!
translation.zh: 爸 妈！

translation.en: -He liked it. Frankie Fromage. -Focus! Phone.
translation.zh: -他还挺喜欢 奶酪弗兰基-别打岔 手机

translation.en: Honey, we've been over this. What do you need a phone for?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 咱们谈过了 你要手机干嘛？

translation.en: Travis Schultz asked for her number to invite her to his party.
translation.zh: 特拉维斯·舒尔茨问她要号码 邀请她去参加派对知道这是什么意思吗？

translation.en: Do you know what that means? He's a senior.
translation.zh: 邀请她去参加派对知道这是什么意思吗？ 他高三了 高三

translation.en: [whispers] Senior.
translation.zh: 他高三了 高三

translation.en: Wait, a senior? Who? What? -Travis who? What party? -[Mim] Hmm?
translation.zh: 等等 高三？哪个特拉维斯？什么派对？

translation.en: What? No. What party? No parties.
translation.zh: 什么？没有 什么派对？没有派对

translation.en: -[mouths] Sorry. -Are his parents be there?
translation.zh: -抱歉-他父母会在场吗？

translation.en: -Oh my God. I don't know, Mom. -[Dad] We can call his parents.
translation.zh: -神啊！我不知道 妈-我们可以给他父母打电话

translation.en: We should call his parents.
translation.zh: 我们应该给他父母打 都打一下

translation.en: -We should call everybody. -Oh my God. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 我们应该给他父母打 都打一下 神啊！不要

translation.en: Absolutely not. Do not call anybody. That's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: 绝对不要 不要打电话 太丢人了

translation.en: Honey, listen...
translation.zh: 亲爱的 听我说

translation.en: I know you think I don't get it, but I was 15 once too.
translation.zh: 我知道你觉得我不懂但我也有过15岁

translation.en: I know a thing or two about parties.
translation.zh: 我对派对略知一二

translation.en: -[snorts] Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的？-对

translation.en: All you ever talk about is how you spent every waking moment in the library.
translation.zh: 你总是说你把时间都花在图书馆了

translation.en: Yeah, well, you know, parties came and went,
translation.zh: 是的 派对来了又走

translation.en: but the library was always there for me.
translation.zh: 但图书馆总是在那里等着我

translation.en: [sighs] You're about to quote your dead poet guy.
translation.zh: 你马上就要引用逝去的诗人了

translation.en: -"There are no strangers here, just…" -[both] "Friends you haven't met."
translation.zh: -没有陌生人-只有你还没认识的朋友

translation.en: William Butler Yeats.
translation.zh: 威廉·巴特勒·叶芝

translation.en: Feel like if you can quote that by heart, you didn't go to a lot of parties.
translation.zh: 如果能从内心引用这句的话那确实没有参加很多派对

translation.en: No parents, no parties.
translation.zh: 家长不在 不准派对

translation.en: -Come on! Nobody else's mom even cares. -Well, I'm not everyone else's mom.
translation.zh: 拜托！别人的妈妈根本不管！ -我可不是别人的妈妈-对 很明显

translation.en: Obviously! Everybody else's moms have a life of their own,
translation.zh: -我可不是别人的妈妈-对 很明显 别人的妈妈都有自己的生活

translation.en: not worrying about what their daughter is doing
translation.zh: 不会坐着没事担心女儿在干嘛

translation.en: and the scary things that might happen. [laughs] God, it's pathetic!
translation.zh: 担心会发生可怕的事 神啊 太可悲了！

translation.en: -[Dad] Hey. -Oh, so, I'm pathetic?
translation.zh: 哎 说我可悲？

translation.en: Yeah. It's sad.
translation.zh: 是的 很不幸

translation.en: You know what else is sad? You're grounded.
translation.zh: 知道什么叫不幸吗？你被禁足了

translation.en: Yeah, you're grounded!
translation.zh: 对 你被禁足了！

translation.en: [sighs] She hates me.
translation.zh: 她恨我

translation.en: Oh, come on, honey…
translation.zh: 噢 别这样 亲爱的

translation.en: [sighs] She's ruining my life, Mim.
translation.zh: 她在毁掉我的生活 小米

translation.en: -Yeah, baby. She's cray. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 对 宝贝儿 她疯了

translation.en: She lose it when you told her you were going to Boston for the summer?
translation.zh: 你跟她说夏天要去波士顿的时候她有没有发火？

translation.en: -You didn't ask her, did you? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你没和她说 是吧？克兰西 你到底想不想去？

translation.en: -Clancy, do you even wanna go? -Yes, of course! I…
translation.zh: 你没和她说 是吧？克兰西 你到底想不想去？ 当然想

translation.en: [sighs] I mean, I'm probably not gonna get accepted anyway.
translation.zh: 反正大概也不会录取我

translation.en: The Berklee Summer Workshop is a really prestigious music program.
translation.zh: 伯克利夏季研讨会是非常著名的音乐活动

translation.en: They get a ton of applicants every year and very few get accepted.
translation.zh: 每年有大量申请者 很少人能被录取

translation.en: [Mim] Clance...
translation.zh: 克兰西

translation.en: You're the best cellist I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最棒的大提琴手

translation.en: [scoffs] OK.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I might be the best cellist in our tiny, little corner on Cape Cod.
translation.zh: 我也许是鳕鱼角的小角落里最棒的大提琴手

translation.en: Know what I think? You're secretly glad your mother never lets you go anywhere
translation.zh: 知道我怎么想吗？ 我觉得你暗自庆幸 你母亲从来不让你去任何地方或做任何事

translation.en: or do anything, 'cause then you don't have to put yourself out there.
translation.zh: 你母亲从来不让你去任何地方或做任何事 因为你就不用站出来了

translation.en: Wha... That's so not true.
translation.zh: 什么啊？根本不是！

translation.en: [Mom] Mim! She's grounded. Time to go.
translation.zh: 小米 她被禁足了 该走了

translation.en: -[Clancy sighs] -Great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Then prove it.
translation.zh: 那就证明给我看

translation.en: We are sneaking out to Travis's party tonight.
translation.zh: 咱们今晚溜出去参加特拉维斯的派对

translation.en: -Mi-- -[Mim] Shh! Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: -小…-没错

translation.en: Put on your skinny jeans and your red tank.
translation.zh: 穿上修身牛仔裤和红色紧身衣

translation.en: -Love you. -[Clancy] Love you, too.
translation.zh: -爱你-也爱你

translation.en: -[Dad] Angus, stop! Angus! Calm down! -[dog barking]
translation.zh: 别动 停下！安格斯 坐下！

translation.en: -[dog barking] -[Dad] Sit. Heel! Heel! Heel!
translation.zh: 坐下！跟着！

translation.en: [yelps] Ah, he got me! Get down! Lay down!
translation.zh: 受不了它 坐下！

translation.en: Stay! I'm the alpha!
translation.zh: 别动 我是老大

translation.en: -Hey, Lewis. What's happenin'? -Hi.
translation.zh: -哎 路易斯 你好啊-你好

translation.en: Kevin's is very excited about tonight's sleepover.
translation.zh: 凯文对今晚的留宿派对很兴奋

translation.en: Thanks for inviting him.
translation.zh: 非常感谢邀请他

translation.en: -Here's a bag with some of his stuff. -Great.
translation.zh: -这个袋子里有他的东西-好的

translation.en: [woman] Including his special nighttime underpants,
translation.zh: 包括他夜里专用的短裤

translation.en: which have sensors that sound a small alarm
translation.zh: 上面有感应器如果湿了会发出小声警报

translation.en: -when they get wet. -Ah. That's cute.
translation.zh: 上面有感应器如果湿了会发出小声警报 不错

translation.en: Lewis has a bit of a problem with [whispers] wetting the bed.
translation.zh: 路易斯有点喜欢尿床

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it, buddy. It happens to the best of 'em.
translation.zh: 哎 别担心 小伙子 很多小孩都这样

translation.en: It happens to me from time to time. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我有时候也这样

translation.en: Ron! Get your prostate checked.
translation.zh: 罗恩 去检查一下前列腺

translation.en: Oh, no, I was, I was…
translation.zh: 噢 不是 我…

translation.en: Ye... I will. I should.
translation.zh: 好的 应该去 确实应该去我会去的

translation.en: -I definitely should. I will. Uh, K-Kevin! -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 好的 应该去 确实应该去我会去的 凯文！路易斯来了

translation.en: Lewis is here!
translation.zh: 凯文！路易斯来了

translation.en: -Come down. Quickly. Like the wind, boy. -[footsteps]
translation.zh: 下来吧 赶紧的 风的速度 孩子

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on, buddy. -[dog barking] -No.
translation.zh: -来吧 小伙子-别叫

translation.en: -[woman] Bye, honey! Be careful. -[Kevin] Let's go!
translation.zh: -再见 亲爱的 小心一点-走吧

translation.en: Those guys are like the three musketeers, without, you know, the--
translation.zh: 这些孩子就像三个火枪手 不过没有…

translation.en: I'll collect him in the morning.
translation.zh: 我早上八点整来接他

translation.en: -Eight o'clock sharp. -OK.
translation.zh: 我早上八点整来接他 好的

translation.en: He'll be fine.
translation.zh: 他没事的

translation.en: Right at the video games.
translation.zh: 马上就打电子游戏了

translation.en: How about you guys do something a bit more, uh, productive?
translation.zh: 你们做点更有意义的事吧？

translation.en: We are! We just took over Tilted Town.
translation.zh: 我们在做啊 我们刚拿下斜镇

translation.en: I meant something a little more physical.
translation.zh: 我是说涉及体力的事

translation.en: -My guy's running. -[Ron laughs]
translation.zh: 我的人在跑

translation.en: OK, Kevin, I think that this is what Mrs. W was talking about.
translation.zh: 好的 凯文 我想韦太太说的就是这个

translation.en: You spend way too much time in these imaginary worlds.
translation.zh: 你在虚幻世界花了太多时间

translation.en: Why don't you go outside into the real world and run around a bit?
translation.zh: 不如去外面 去真实的世界 跑跑步？

translation.en: Oh... Here, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh: 给你 芬奇先生

translation.en: -What's this? -A list of my known allergens.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-我已知过敏原的清单

translation.en: It's laminated for protection.
translation.zh: 已经过膜压保护

translation.en: Mom was concerned about your cavalier parenting style.
translation.zh: 我妈对你漫不经心的育儿风格很担心

translation.en: -It means-- -I know what it means.
translation.zh: -意思是缺乏…-我知道是什么意思

translation.en: OK. I'll make it simple. How about this? Who wants pizza for dinner?
translation.zh: 好的 我简单一点 这样吧？谁晚餐要吃披萨？

translation.en: Me!
translation.zh: -我！-我不准吃加工过的奶酪

translation.en: -I'm not allowed processed cheeses. -Well, Lewis, it'll be our little secret.
translation.zh: -我！-我不准吃加工过的奶酪 没事的 路易斯 这是咱们的小秘密

translation.en: -I'm not allowed to have secrets. -Oh, it's gonna be a long night.
translation.zh: 我不准有秘密 噢 今晚可不轻松

translation.en: Honey, I mean, almond milk, soy milk... Can we just get regular milk for once?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 杏仁奶 豆奶咱们能不能买一次普通牛奶？

translation.en: You can't just squeeze something and call it milk. -That's just nut water. -[toilet flushing in video]
translation.zh: 不能挤点东西就说是牛奶就是坚果水嘛

translation.en: You like nut wa-- What? Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 你喜欢坚果… 等等

translation.en: H-honey, honey, I-I gotta go.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我要挂了

translation.en: Everything OK here, boys?
translation.zh: 没事吧 孩子们？

translation.en: Oh, crap!
translation.zh: 噢 糟糕！

translation.en: -[dog barking] -Hey! No! Angus, no! Angus! Angus! -Whoa! -No! Stop! No!
translation.zh: 哎 别叫！安格斯 别这样！

translation.en: [pizza guy] Here you go, bud. I happen to have a dog treat for ya.
translation.zh: 来 小伙子 我刚好有狗粮给你

translation.en: Gotta be prepared for anything in this line of work, man.
translation.zh: 做这种工作 什么都要有所准备

translation.en: That was impressive. [laughs]
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: -What do I owe ya? -Uh, it's gonna be 18.45.
translation.zh: 多少钱？ 18美元45美分

translation.en: Forty-five. You got it. I have… Oh...
translation.zh: 45美分 好的 我有…

translation.en: -I only have a twenty. That's a bad tip. -Oh, don't sweat it.
translation.zh: -我只有20美元 小费太少了-噢 没事的

translation.en: No, no, no, I don't wanna be that guy.
translation.zh: 不行 我不想做这种人

translation.en: Take that, but don't go. Hold on. Take this.
translation.zh: 拿好吧 不过先别走等一下 这个拿好

translation.en: I own the bakery on Wyndhurst. Stop by, OK?
translation.zh: 我在温胡斯特街有一家面包房 顺路过来 好吗？

translation.en: -Anything you want, on the house. -OK.
translation.zh: -随便拿 店里请客-好的

translation.en: -Cool. Thank you, man. -[Ron chuckles] Cool, man.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢-好的

translation.en: Nice guy.
translation.zh: 人不错

translation.en: [in British accent] It's her.
translation.zh: 是她

translation.en: Wow! You guys picked the perfect night for a campout.
translation.zh: 哇！你俩选的日子非常好 很适合露营 一定会很棒！

translation.en: [chuckles] This is gonna be so cool.
translation.zh: 很适合露营 一定会很棒！

translation.en: -I don't get why we're being punished. -Kev, you're not being punished.
translation.zh: 我不明白为什么要罚我们 凯文 没有罚你们很好玩的 是一次冒险

translation.en: -It's fun. It's an adventure. -Uh, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh: 凯文 没有罚你们很好玩的 是一次冒险 芬奇先生 在无人监护的情况下

translation.en: I'm not allowed to play in unfamiliar frontier settings unsupervised.
translation.zh: 芬奇先生 在无人监护的情况下 我不准在不熟悉的前线环境玩耍

translation.en: Good news, it's not a frontier. You're in our backyard.
translation.zh: 好在这里不是前线 是在我家后院

translation.en: There's a fence. You're gonna be perfectly safe.
translation.zh: 有围栏 路易斯 所以你会非常安全

translation.en: Come on, guys. Inside.
translation.zh: 来吧 小伙子 进去

translation.en: There you go. You got it.
translation.zh: 进去吧 好的

translation.en: Look at this tent. We haven't used this tent in ages.
translation.zh: 看看这个帐篷 咱们好久没用过了

translation.en: Yeah, because it sucks! There are bugs everywhere.
translation.zh: 对 因为很烂！ 到处都是虫 那边在结茧！

translation.en: -That thing's cocooning! -There are not bugs everywhere! Ju... Oh!
translation.zh: 到处都是虫 那边在结茧！ 没有到处都是虫 只是…

translation.en: There he goes... just back to his little spot, see?
translation.zh: 在那里 回到它的地方了 看见没有？

translation.en: Do me a favor. Sleep with your mouths closed, OK?
translation.zh: 不过帮个忙 睡的时候闭上嘴 好吧？

translation.en: Anyway, have a good time, guys! This is fun! Camping out!
translation.zh: 不管怎样 好好玩 小伙子！露营很好玩的

translation.en: What now?
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？

translation.en: -We could tell scary stories. -OK.
translation.zh: 咱们可以将恐怖故事 好的

translation.en: That sounds cool.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: You go first.
translation.zh: 你先来

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: Air? Wolf? -[crunching] -Badger?
translation.zh: 风？狼？獾？

translation.en: -Probably not a badger. -Alien?
translation.zh: -大概不是獾-外星人？

translation.en: With hooks for hands?
translation.zh: 手上有钩子？

translation.en: -[Mim laughs] My God! -[Kevin] Jeez, Mim.
translation.zh: 天哪 小米！ 哎 看你们的脸

translation.en: -[both panting] -[Mim] Oh, you guys should see your faces.
translation.zh: 哎 看你们的脸

translation.en: What are you little turds doin' out here?
translation.zh: 你们俩在这里干嘛？

translation.en: -S-sleeping in the tent. -Duh. Why?
translation.zh: 睡帐篷 噢 为什么？

translation.en: My dad thinks it's good for us, or something.
translation.zh: 我爸觉得这对我们有好处

translation.en: [scoffs] Parents are so weird.
translation.zh: 家长好奇怪

translation.en: [chuckles softly] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干嘛？

translation.en: Sneaking out, obviously. Cute jammies.
translation.zh: 溜出去 很明显嘛 睡衣很可爱

translation.en: -Busted! -[sheepish giggle]
translation.zh: 逮个正着

translation.en: -Sorry, I was just, uh-- -Oh... I know what you were doing.
translation.zh: -不好意思 我只是…-不用说了 我知道你在干嘛

translation.en: You were trying to sneak one of these.
translation.zh: -你想偷这个吃-对

translation.en: -Yes. [chuckles] -Yes! I know.
translation.zh: -你想偷这个吃-对 对！我知道

translation.en: Every time
translation.zh: 每次我视作新品

translation.en: I bake a new tester recipe, there's always one or two missing in the morning.
translation.zh: 每次我视作新品 早上都会少掉一两个

translation.en: I always thought it was Kevin, but now I know, it's my daughter.
translation.zh: 我一直以为是凯文不过我现在知道了 是我女儿

translation.en: [chuckles] Guilty.
translation.zh: 被你逮到了

translation.en: OK... [smacks lips]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Brown sugar, banana, with avocado frosting.
translation.zh: 红糖 香蕉 加牛油果糖霜

translation.en: Gettin' crazy, Dad.
translation.zh: 好离谱 爸

translation.en: A little wild, but tell me what you think.
translation.zh: 有点野 说说你觉得味道怎么样

translation.en: You were a little hard on Mom tonight.
translation.zh: 你今天对妈妈有点过分啊

translation.en: She was hard on me. She grounded me for no reason.
translation.zh: 是她对我过分 无缘无故对我禁足

translation.en: Well, she had her reasons. You can't talk to Mom like that.
translation.zh: 她有她的理由你不能那样对妈妈说话

translation.en: You know, you two are more alike than you know.
translation.zh: 你不知道 其实你们俩很像

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Alright, enough with the lecture. What do you think? [sighs]
translation.zh: 好的 上课上够了 怎么样？

translation.en: -It's actually really good. -Good! I picked the right profession.
translation.zh: 很不错 好的 -我选对了职业-对

translation.en: -[laughs] Yeah. -[Ron laughs]
translation.zh: -我选对了职业-对

translation.en: Alright. Well, you finish that one.
translation.zh: 好的 你吃完这一个

translation.en: -Do not touch any of the other ones. -OK.
translation.zh: -其他别碰-好的

translation.en: -If Kevin asks, you were never here. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 如果凯文问起来 你就说没这事

translation.en: -Alright. Don't stay up too late. -OK.
translation.zh: -好的 别太晚睡-好的

translation.en: -Alright. I love you. -Love you, too.
translation.zh: -好的 我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: So... where you sneakin' out to?
translation.zh: 对了 溜出去上哪儿？

translation.en: You sneakin' out to meet a guy? Dude? Man?
translation.zh: 溜出去见男生？小伙子？男人？

translation.en: Don't tell him anything. He's just gonna tell on us.
translation.zh: 什么都别跟他说 他会高我们的密 他是大嘴巴

translation.en: -He's a total tattletale. -I am not!
translation.zh: 他会高我们的密 他是大嘴巴 我不是！我们经常溜出去 对吧？

translation.en: And we sneak out all the time, right?
translation.zh: 我不是！我们经常溜出去 对吧？

translation.en: You do not sneak out.
translation.zh: 你不溜出去 你怕黑

translation.en: -You're too afraid of the dark. -[mouth full] No, we love the dark. Right?
translation.zh: 你不溜出去 你怕黑 不 我们喜欢黑 我们喜欢黑 对吧？

translation.en: Says the boy with the Captain America night-light in his room.
translation.zh: 他房间里有美国队长夜灯

translation.en: Hey, it's not a night-light, it's an area illuminator,
translation.zh: 哎 不是夜灯 是区域照明器

translation.en: in case I have to pee or get a drink in the middle of the night.
translation.zh: 以防半夜要撒尿或者喝一杯

translation.en: [Clancy] He makes crap up. He's a liar.
translation.zh: 他老是胡编乱造 他是个大骗子

translation.en: [Kevin] I'm telling Mom you called me a liar. I have to use the restroom.
translation.zh: -我告诉妈你说我是骗子-我要去一下洗手间

translation.en: -Don't look at the Gatorade. -[girls] Oh! [Lewis] You got this. You're a big boy!
translation.zh: 别看佳得乐 你没问题的 你是大孩子

translation.en: -Dog? -Neutralized.
translation.zh: -狗呢？-消灭了

translation.en: Come on, Lewis.
translation.zh: 加油 路易斯

translation.en: You've had nothing to drink since noon. Yesterday.
translation.zh: 你从昨天中午到现在没喝过东西

translation.en: You got this, man!
translation.zh: 你没问题的 小伙儿！

translation.en: [whispers] OK, here we go.
translation.zh: 好的 来吧

translation.en: Hey, Clancy?
translation.zh: 哎 克兰西

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter.
translation.zh: 有其母 必有其女

translation.en: Are you gonna kill me with carbs?
translation.zh: 你要用碳水杀死我？

translation.en: -Should have brought backup. -[woman] He did.
translation.zh: -你应该带人来增援的-他带了

translation.en: Hey. Is this about the tip?
translation.zh: 哎 是因为小费吗？

translation.en: Hello again, Mathilde.
translation.zh: 又见面了 玛蒂尔德

translation.en: Mathilde? No, that's Margot. Oh! OK. I understand.
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔德？不对 她叫玛戈特噢 好的 我明白了

translation.en: So, apparently this is... [sighs] a huge misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 显然是完全搞错了

translation.en: I see you've met my friend Baxter.
translation.zh: 你见过我的朋友巴克斯特了

translation.en: Jean-Paul asked us to swing by, get the old band back together.
translation.zh: 尚保罗让我来一趟 把老队伍拉起来

translation.en: -No, thanks. [sighs] -Honey, you know these two?
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 亲爱的 你认识他们俩？

translation.en: The crown of Durámuran, it's here.
translation.zh: 杜兰木兰王冠在这里

translation.en: Looks like you'll get one more shot at it after all.
translation.zh: 看来还会有一次机会

translation.en: I really think that you guys are in the wrong place.
translation.zh: 我真觉得你们找错地方了

translation.en: You're talking about crowns. The Neidmeyers live two houses down.
translation.zh: 因为你们在说冠 对吧？尼德迈尔家还要过去两幢房子

translation.en: He's a dentist, does lot of crown work, so--
translation.zh: 他是牙医 所以会做很多牙冠的活儿

translation.en: I'm not interested.
translation.zh: -所以我觉得…-我没兴趣

translation.en: Oh, that's a shame. We need both of you.
translation.zh: 噢 太可惜了 你们俩我们都需要

translation.en: Both?
translation.zh: 都需要？

translation.en: [together] Both.
translation.zh: 都需要

translation.en: -Are you guys talking about me too? -[both] No.
translation.zh: -你们是在说我吗？-不是

translation.en: Oh, well, you said both, so that's--
translation.zh: 噢 你们说两人都需要 所以我…

translation.en: -Time's up. Are you in or dead? -OK!
translation.zh: 时间到 你要加入还是要死？

translation.en: No! No. That is not the saying. It's not "in or dead," it's "in or out."
translation.zh: 不对！不对 话不是这么说的 不是“要加入还是要死”而是“加入还是不加入”

translation.en: It's "in or out."
translation.zh: 不是“要加入还是要死”而是“加入还是不加入”

translation.en: I would like to speak for my wife, and we're gonna respectfully say
translation.zh: 我想代表我妻子说 我们很尊敬地回答

translation.en: w-w-we are out.
translation.zh: 我们不加入

translation.en: -[panting] -I'm in.
translation.zh: 我加入

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Ron] W-What? Honey…
translation.zh: 什么？ 亲爱的…

translation.en: -Honey, wh-- -Good night.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 为什…-晚安

translation.en: -[Ron] Margot! -[gasps] -Relax! It's just a mild sedative. -[Ron] Margot.
translation.zh: -玛戈特！-噢 别紧张！只是中度镇静剂

translation.en: Your wife is a dangerous woman, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh: 你妻子是一个非常危险的女人芬奇先生

translation.en: At least, she used to be.
translation.zh: 至少以前是

translation.en: [woman] Stuff 'em in the car. Let's get going.
translation.zh: -玛戈特！-把他们塞上车 然后出发

translation.en: Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys!
translation.zh: 哎！

translation.en: Hey, you're gonna wake up my parents!
translation.zh: 哎 你会吵醒我父母的！

translation.en: No, they're gone! Ninjas just stole your parents.
translation.zh: 不是 他们不在了！忍者把你父母偷走了！

translation.en: S-See? I never lie. I was telling the truth!
translation.zh: 看见没？我从来不说谎 我是说真的

translation.en: -[panting] -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 神啊 妈？

translation.en: -[shouts] Mom? -[Mim] Why would they take your parents?
translation.zh: 神啊 妈？ 为什么会有人抓走你父母呢？

translation.en: No offense, your dad owns a bakery, your mom's a housewife.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 你爸是开面包房的 你妈是家庭主妇 没什么

translation.en: -It's not thrilling. -I don't think your mom's really your mom.
translation.zh: 你妈是家庭主妇 没什么 我想你妈可能不是真的你妈

translation.en: I think she was, like, the head ninja, and she was a very dangerous woman,
translation.zh: 她可能是忍者头头 是非常危险的人

translation.en: and they kept calling her... Mathilde.
translation.zh: 他们老是叫她玛蒂尔德

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Mom has another name than "Mom"?
translation.zh: 妈妈除了叫妈妈之外还有别的名字？

translation.en: No! Mom doesn't have another name, OK? She's not a ninja.
translation.zh: 没有 妈妈没有别的名字 好吧？她不是忍者

translation.en: She won't go in the basement, she's afraid of crickets.
translation.zh: 她连地下室都不愿意去 因为害怕蟋蟀跳来跳去

translation.en: -They're back! -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -他们回来了！-天哪！

translation.en: -Who's they? What? -[Mim mumbles] Shh!
translation.zh: 他们是谁？什么…

translation.en: [man] Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Anybody here?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: Ooh, hey!
translation.zh: 噢 哎 凯文！

translation.en: Kevin! I'm not here to hurt you, buddy.
translation.zh: 噢 哎 凯文！ 我不是来伤害你的 小伙子

translation.en: I'm-I'm a friend of your mom's. Remember me? Henry?
translation.zh: 我是你妈的朋友 记得吗？亨利

translation.en: OK. That is… a really cool sword.
translation.zh: 好 这把剑很酷

translation.en: Yeah. It's a pirate sword.
translation.zh: 对 这是私人的剑

translation.en: -Don't make me use it! -[Henry] Oh, OK. [laughs] Whoa.
translation.zh: 别逼我出剑！ 噢 好的

translation.en: Kevin, you are really brave,
translation.zh: 凯文 你真的很勇敢

translation.en: but, I mean, we both know that's not a real sword, right?
translation.zh: 但是咱们都知道这不是真剑 对吧？

translation.en: He looks way too fat to be a ninja.
translation.zh: 他太胖了 不可能是忍者

translation.en: You know, I can hear you.
translation.zh: 我可以听见你们说话

translation.en: These things keep your ears warm, but don't keep the sound out.
translation.zh: 这东西是给耳朵保暖的 不是隔音的

translation.en: -Where are our parents? -[Henry] OK, listen.
translation.zh: 我们的爸妈在哪里？ 好的 听我说

translation.en: Kids, this is gonna sound confusing
translation.zh: 孩子们 这可能听起来不容易理解

translation.en: and a little scary.
translation.zh: 也有点吓人

translation.en: My name is Henry Gibbs and I'm a U.S. Marshal.
translation.zh: 我叫亨利·吉布斯 我是联邦法警

translation.en: I work for the division of WITSEC. You might know that as Witness Protection.
translation.zh: 我在证人保护组工作

translation.en: About 15 years ago, your mom entered the program.
translation.zh: 大约15年前你们的妈妈加入了证人保护计划

translation.en: [Kevin] Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: You mean to tell me our mom's in witness protection?
translation.zh: 你是说我们的妈妈参加了证人保护计划？

translation.en: -Like what they do with mob guys? -I'm not allowed to get involved
translation.zh: 就像那些黑社会一样？ 我不准参与犯罪行动

translation.en: -with criminal activity. -Kids, look, a long time ago,
translation.zh: 我不准参与犯罪行动 孩子们 听我说 很久之前 你们妈妈和一些很危险的人 渔妇帮

translation.en: your mom got into some bad things with some very dangerous people:
translation.zh: 很久之前 你们妈妈和一些很危险的人 渔妇帮 牵涉进了一些很糟糕的事

translation.en: the Pescatrici Syndicate.
translation.zh: 牵涉进了一些很糟糕的事

translation.en: They were going to jail,
translation.zh: 他们本来要进监狱了

translation.en: and we convinced them to rat out a very big crime boss.
translation.zh: 我们说服他们供出了一个黑帮老大

translation.en: After that, we had to get them new identities.
translation.zh: 之后 我们给了他们新的身份

translation.en: It was my job to protect your mom.
translation.zh: 我负责保护你们妈妈

translation.en: Our mom had a whole different life? What's her real name?
translation.zh: 我们妈妈以前有完全不同的生活？她的真名叫什么？

translation.en: Well, I mean, that's classified informa--
translation.zh: 呃 这是保密信息…

translation.en: Mathilde Tremblay. Born November 7th, 1976, Ontario, Canada.
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱1976年11月7日出生于加拿大安大略

translation.en: -[Clancy scoffs] -We're Canadian?
translation.zh: 我们是加拿大人？

translation.en: Wait, is that my phone? How did you get my passcode?
translation.zh: 等等 那是我的手机吗？你怎么会有我的密码？

translation.en: What? The first four digits of your badge number?
translation.zh: 什么？你工作证编号前四位？

translation.en: -Yeah, that was tough to crack. -OK. Don't like her.
translation.zh: 对 这个密码真难破 好的 我不喜欢她 好的 听我说

translation.en: Alright, listen.
translation.zh: 好的 我不喜欢她 好的 听我说

translation.en: A video of Kevin dancing, with his mom in it, got on the internet.
translation.zh: 一段凯文跳舞的视频里面有他妈妈 视频上了网

translation.en: It went viral. It got, like, a million hits.
translation.zh: 火了 好像有100万点击

translation.en: The bad guys must have seen it and tracked her down.
translation.zh: 坏人一定是看到了视频然后找到了她

translation.en: A video of me...
translation.zh: 我的视频…

translation.en: Oh, no. Um, that... No, that didn't happen.
translation.zh: 噢 不是吧 没这种事

translation.en: -[Clancy] Nice job, Kevin. -Fiancé: Leo Beauchamp.
translation.zh: 厉害 凯文 未婚夫 利奥·博尚

translation.en: Born May 11th, 1974.
translation.zh: 1974年5月11日出生哇！看看这个帅哥

translation.en: -Whoa, check out this hottie. -What? She had a fiancé?
translation.zh: 1974年5月11日出生哇！看看这个帅哥 -什么？她有未婚夫？-他好帅

translation.en: -[Kevin] He is pretty cute. -[Clancy] He's a musician?
translation.zh: -什么？她有未婚夫？-他好帅 他是音乐人？

translation.en: -How long ago were they engaged? -This was so long ago.
translation.zh: 他们多久前订婚的？ 这是很久之前了！当时你们还没生！

translation.en: It's before you guys were even born.
translation.zh: 这是很久之前了！当时你们还没生！

translation.en: Kids, your mom is a completely different person than what she was.
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们妈妈当时是完全不同的一个人

translation.en: Tss! Yeah, no kidding. She was some Canadian named Mathilde!
translation.zh: 没错 她当时是名叫玛蒂尔德的加拿大人

translation.en: What bad things did she do?
translation.zh: 她当时做了什么坏事？

translation.en: She stole things. Very expensive things.
translation.zh: 她偷了东西 很昂贵的东西

translation.en: I knew it! She always takes the free samples at the grocery store.
translation.zh: 我就知道！她老是拿超市的免费样品

translation.en: Not just one. I'm talking entire handfuls, OK?
translation.zh: 不是拿一个 是手上拿满 好吧？

translation.en: They said they were "getting the band back together." She said she was in.
translation.zh: 他们说要把队伍拉起来 她说加入

translation.en: [Henry] Uh, no, no. Hey, hey, stop it.
translation.zh: 不是 哎 别这样

translation.en: We're jumping to conclusions. Y-Your mom--
translation.zh: 不要妄下结论 你们妈妈…

translation.en: Mom? Whose mom? Is she even our real mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈？谁是妈妈？她是我们亲妈吗？

translation.en: Is anything real?
translation.zh: 有真的事吗？

translation.en: -My whole life has been a lie! -Oh, Kevin…
translation.zh: -我的整个人生都是谎话！-凯文

translation.en: Is that even my real name?
translation.zh: 这是我的真名吗？

translation.en: Of course it's your real name.
translation.zh: 当然是你的真名

translation.en: [Kevin] I hate hockey and Canadian bacon. It's just ham.
translation.zh: 我讨厌冰球和加拿大培根就是火腿嘛

translation.en: I said some really, really mean stuff to her today.
translation.zh: 我今天对她说了很刻薄的话

translation.en: I called her pathetic.
translation.zh: 我说她可悲

translation.en: -[Kevin] ...video off the internet? -[Henry] Yeah, it was adorable.
translation.zh: -你说视频已经已经撤下网了？-是的 很可爱

translation.en: Wait. This is Mom's necklace. She wears this every day.
translation.zh: 等等 这是妈妈的项链 她每天都戴

translation.en: -She never takes it off. -Yea, she never does.
translation.zh: -从来不取下来-对 没错

translation.en: Whoa, look at this.
translation.zh: 哎 看这里

translation.en: Ooh, she left a message!
translation.zh: 噢 她留了一条信息！

translation.en: -[Clancy] What? -[Mim] Yes, what is this? Uh, Ang...
translation.zh: -什么？-对 写了什么？ 呃 安…安格…

translation.en: -Am... Anger... -[Clancy] Ak... An...
translation.zh: 呃 安…安格…

translation.en: Oh, Angus! Angus!
translation.zh: 噢 “安格斯”

translation.en: Who's Angus? Who's Angus?
translation.zh: -安格斯是谁？-安格斯是谁？

translation.en: -Your dog. Oh my God. -Yes. OK.
translation.zh: -你的狗-噢 我的狗

translation.en: Hey, Angus.
translation.zh: 你好 安格斯

translation.en: Angus!
translation.zh: 安格斯

translation.en: [shouts] What do you need to tell us?
translation.zh: 你要告诉我们什么？

translation.en: -[dog breathing softly] -Hello? Anybody home?
translation.zh: 哎 有人在家吗？

translation.en: Ah, it's no use.
translation.zh: 哎 没用

translation.en: -What's wrong with him? -I don't know. He's out cold.
translation.zh: -他怎么了？-不知道 它好冷

translation.en: Dude, he's drugged.
translation.zh: 哎 它被下药了

translation.en: Take off his collar so he's more comfortable. Poor baby.
translation.zh: 把它的项圈拿下来 这样它会舒服一点 可怜的宝宝

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: One, nine, nine, Fayette Street.
translation.zh: 费耶街199号

translation.en: That's not our address.
translation.zh: 这不是我们的地址

translation.en: Wait a second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Look! The symbols match. That has to mean something, right?
translation.zh: 看！符号一样 一定有含义 对吧？

translation.en: What would that mean? Who's at that address?
translation.zh: 什么含义？这是谁的地址？

translation.en: I don't know. Uh, maybe Mom's trying to tell us something?
translation.zh: 不知道 也许妈想要告诉我们什么？

translation.en: -We should go! -Children, listen.
translation.zh: -咱们应该去！-孩子们 听我说

translation.en: -Whatever you're trying to do right now-- -No!
translation.zh: -不论你们现在想做什么…-不行！

translation.en: Guys, whatever's at this address could help us find them.
translation.zh: 这个地方可能会帮助我们找到他们

translation.en: We can fix this.
translation.zh: 咱们可以解决这个问题

translation.en: -Let's go get Mom and Dad back. -[Henry] Uh, no way!
translation.zh: 咱们去把爸妈救回来 不行！

translation.en: Those are dangerous people.
translation.zh: 那些人很危险

translation.en: You need to leave this to the adults
translation.zh: 你们得交给成年人和受过训练的专业人士

translation.en: and trained professionals such as myself.
translation.zh: 你们得交给成年人和受过训练的专业人士 比如我！

translation.en: Baby, you're tied to a chair with Christmas lights.
translation.zh: 宝宝 你被圣诞灯绑在椅子上

translation.en: Hey! You kids can't just leave me here. [sighs] Oh... Oh, see?
translation.zh: 哎！你们这帮孩子不能把我留在这里 噢 是吧？

translation.en: You know what? I may have misjudged you.
translation.zh: 知道吗？我可能错看你了

translation.en: -If you could just ke-- -[Christmas jingle playing]
translation.zh: 麻烦你…

translation.en: Oh, she is the worst.
translation.zh: 噢 这姑娘最坏

translation.en: -[driver] Miriam? -Yeah, that's me.
translation.zh: -米里亚姆？-对 是我

translation.en: It's night.
translation.zh: 现在是半夜

translation.en: -Your parents know you're out? -Yes!
translation.zh: -家长知道吗？-知道！

translation.en: -Of course. -They joined a gang of ninjas.
translation.zh: -知道-当然知道 他们加入了忍者帮

translation.en: -Shh! -Is this weird?
translation.zh: 有什么古怪吗？我会惹麻烦吗？

translation.en: -Will I get in trouble? -No, dude. Seriously?
translation.zh: 有什么古怪吗？我会惹麻烦吗？ 不会 不是吧？

translation.en: You're making it weird. You want me to give you the one star?
translation.zh: 你别弄得这么古怪 要我给你评一星吗？

translation.en: -I'll do it. -She'll do it.
translation.zh: -我会的-她会的

translation.en: Lewis, come on, man.
translation.zh: 路易斯 来啊 兄弟

translation.en: This is our chance to be heroes in the real world.
translation.zh: 这是我们在真实世界做英雄的机会

translation.en: Not some imaginary world everyone says we live in.
translation.zh: 而不是像他们说的那样活在想象的世界中

translation.en: Come on. Let's go save my parents.
translation.zh: 来吧 咱们去救我父母

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[Mim] Boys, let's go. -[Kevin] Get in the car.
translation.zh: 小伙子们 走了 上车

translation.en: Buckle up.
translation.zh: 系好安全带

translation.en: -[Baxter] Go. -[Ron] OK. Alright.
translation.zh: -走-好的

translation.en: Witness protection. I can't believe you didn't tell me.
translation.zh: 证人保护计划 你居然没告诉我

translation.en: Honey, that's the point of witness protection.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 证人保护的重点就在此

translation.en: -You can't tell anyone. -So, what?
translation.zh: -不能告诉任何人-所以呢？

translation.en: You were loosely associated with bad guys who were involved in criminal activity?
translation.zh: 你和参与犯罪行为的坏人有松散的联系？

translation.en: Sure, we'll go with that.
translation.zh: 对 可以这么说

translation.en: So you're not really from Nebraska?
translation.zh: 所以你不是真的内布拉斯加人？

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes, you're from Nebraska.
translation.zh: -是的-是的！ 你是内布拉斯加人好吧 至少这是真的

translation.en: OK, well, at least that's true.
translation.zh: 你是内布拉斯加人好吧 至少这是真的

translation.en: No. I mean, yes, I'm not from Nebraska.
translation.zh: 不是 我是说我不是内布拉斯加人

translation.en: What about your Cornhuskers T-shirt?
translation.zh: 那你的掰棒子T恤是怎么回事呢？

translation.en: They gave it to me.
translation.zh: 别人给我的

translation.en: -I'm sorry, I couldn't tell you. -[Ron] Is our marriage a lie?
translation.zh: -对不起 我之前没办法告诉你-咱们的婚姻都是谎言吗？

translation.en: No. I know this is traumatic.
translation.zh: -不是 我知道这很难接受-对 很难接受 咱们被用枪指着！

translation.en: Yeah! We're being held at gunpoint! We've been kidnapped!
translation.zh: -不是 我知道这很难接受-对 很难接受 咱们被用枪指着！ -咱们被绑架了！-闭嘴 否则我把你俩都杀了

translation.en: -Shut up before I kill you both. -Shutting up.
translation.zh: -咱们被绑架了！-闭嘴 否则我把你俩都杀了

translation.en: [Margot] Angus?
translation.zh: 安格斯？

translation.en: Angus! Hi, buddy.
translation.zh: 安格斯 你好

translation.en: Oh, you got old.
translation.zh: 噢 你变老了

translation.en: Who's there?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Mathilde.
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔德

translation.en: -Leo. -Who's that?
translation.zh: 利奥 是谁？

translation.en: -Her fiancé. -Her what?
translation.zh: -她的未婚夫-她的什么？

translation.en: Oh, that's great. That's… that's great.
translation.zh: 噢 太好了

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -[softly] I don't...
translation.zh: 你怎么来了？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: [woman] For this!
translation.zh: 为这个

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: [driver] This is it, kids.
translation.zh: 到了 孩子们

translation.en: [Clancy] Great. Creepy storage unit place.
translation.zh: -很好 恐怖的仓库-很可爱 很好

translation.en: -[Mim] It's cute. It's great. -[Clancy] This night keeps getting better.
translation.zh: -很好 恐怖的仓库-很可爱 很好 今晚越来越精彩了

translation.en: [Lewis] I'm not allowed to break into private property.
translation.zh: 我不准闯入私人领地

translation.en: -[Clancy] Your choice, Lewis. -[Mim] Nobody's allowed to trespass.
translation.zh: 你自己选 路易斯

translation.en: [sighs] Thanks, team. We got this. Thanks, guys.
translation.zh: 伙伴们 咱们可以的 谢谢

translation.en: Wait for me.
translation.zh: 等等我

translation.en: [Ron] OK, wait! I wanna make sure I get this straight.
translation.zh: 好的 等等 看看我有没有理解对

translation.en: You got the same exact kind of dog,
translation.zh: 你们有完全一样的狗

translation.en: and then gave it the same exact name.
translation.zh: 取了一样的名字知道我想给你的狗取什么名字吗？

translation.en: Know what I wanted to name it? Indiana Bones.
translation.zh: 取了一样的名字知道我想给你的狗取什么名字吗？ 印第安纳骨头 但是你坚持…现在大概知道为什么了

translation.en: But you insisted on Angus and now I know why.
translation.zh: 印第安纳骨头 但是你坚持…现在大概知道为什么了

translation.en: I wasn't allowed to bring him into the program and I missed him.
translation.zh: 不允许我把他带进证人保护计划但是我当时想他

translation.en: There's a midnight gala tonight in the Grand Concert Hall.
translation.zh: 今晚在大音乐厅有午夜狂欢

translation.en: The royal crown of Durámuran.
translation.zh: 杜兰木兰王冠

translation.en: The crown will be on the head of the Queen of Moldana.
translation.zh: 这个王冠将由摩大拿王后戴上

translation.en: -The King and the Queen-- -Sorry, don't mean to interrupt, ma'am.
translation.zh: -现在 国王和王后…-不好意思 不是有意打断 女士

translation.en: Honey, is there a second set of children who look exactly like ours
translation.zh: 亲爱的 是不是还有一群孩子 和咱们的孩子一模一样的要告诉我一下？

translation.en: that I should know about?
translation.zh: 和咱们的孩子一模一样的要告诉我一下？

translation.en: [Leo] Wait. You have kids?
translation.zh: 等等 你们有孩子？

translation.en: -Course you do. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -当然有-对

translation.en: I mean, when we both went into the program, I just…
translation.zh: 咱俩都加入了证人保护计划

translation.en: I guess I just never found… the right person.
translation.zh: 大概是我没找到合适的人吧

translation.en: You know what else you didn't find, Leo?
translation.zh: 知道你还有什么没找到吗 利奥？

translation.en: Your sleeves. You couldn't find your sleeves.
translation.zh: 你的袖子 你找不到你的袖子 外面很冷

translation.en: -It's cold out! What's he trying to prove? -Ron!
translation.zh: 你找不到你的袖子 外面很冷 -他想证明什么？-罗恩！

translation.en: You know what? The answer is no. We won't do it.
translation.zh: 答案是不行 我们不做

translation.en: -Then, we have no use for you. -[gun cocks]
translation.zh: 那你们对我们就没用了

translation.en: -[Ron] Nah. -No, no. Wait, wait.
translation.zh: 不 等等

translation.en: If we steal this,
translation.zh: 如果我们偷到这个东西

translation.en: that's it. We're done. We're even.
translation.zh: 就到此为止 两不相欠

translation.en: You leave my family alone.
translation.zh: 不要碰我的家人

translation.en: We pull this off, we never have to work again.
translation.zh: 这件事做成 我们就不用再工作了

translation.en: We'll disappear. Those kids will be safe and sound.
translation.zh: 我们会消失 你的孩子会安然无恙

translation.en: No... it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 不行 太危险了

translation.en: God, he's so big!
translation.zh: 神啊 他好高大！

translation.en: You heard what they said. If we commit another crime in the program,
translation.zh: 你听到他们的话了如果我们在受保护期间再犯罪

translation.en: we go to jail for a long time.
translation.zh: 就要坐很久的牢

translation.en: There's no second chance for us this time.
translation.zh: 这次咱们没有第二次机会了

translation.en: Well then, we just won't get caught.
translation.zh: 那咱们不要被抓到就行了

translation.en: [Kevin] Oh, this is unit seven.
translation.zh: 噢 这里是七单元

translation.en: [sighs] But it's locked. Of course.
translation.zh: 但是锁住了 当然了

translation.en: And we don't have the combination.
translation.zh: 我们没有密码

translation.en: I mean... [sighs] I use my birthday for my locker.
translation.zh: 我的储物柜密码是我的生日

translation.en: Try my birthday.
translation.zh: 试试我的生日

translation.en: My birthday is March 20th.
translation.zh: 我的生日是3月20日

translation.en: My birthday.
translation.zh: 我的生日

translation.en: It's dark in there.
translation.zh: 里面好黑

translation.en: This is a bit of a letdown.
translation.zh: 有点令人失望

translation.en: It's just Nana and Grampy's old crap.
translation.zh: 就是外公外婆的旧东西

translation.en: There's nothing cool here.
translation.zh: 这里没什么好东西

translation.en: [Mim] I don't know, babe. There's just a lot of chairs in here.
translation.zh: 不知道 这里有好多椅子啊

translation.en: [Clancy] We won't find anything.
translation.zh: 不可能在这里找到什么东西

translation.en: [Mim] There's at least four chairs in this corner.
translation.zh: 这个角落就有至少四张椅子

translation.en: I'm just really put off by the amount of chairs in front of us.
translation.zh: 有这么多椅子真是把我吓到了

translation.en: [automated voice] DNA recognized.
translation.zh: DNA已识别

translation.en: Kevin, what did you do?
translation.zh: 凯文 你干了什么？

translation.en: Nothing! That was already there.
translation.zh: 没什么？这东西本来就有的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -Kevin? -Kevin? -Kev? -[mechanism clanking]
translation.zh: -凯文？-凯文？

translation.en: Kevin?
translation.zh: 凯文？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 噢 好哎

translation.en: I don't think your mom was just a regular smash-and-grab thief.
translation.zh: 我觉得你妈不只是普通的小偷

translation.en: -[softly] Yeah. -I saw this bad boy on Forza Horizon!
translation.zh: 对 我在《极限竞速 地平线》里见过这辆车

translation.en: -What? -[Kevin] Like the rarest car ever!
translation.zh: -什么啊？-这是最稀罕的车！

translation.en: Can't believe Nana and Grampy have one of these!
translation.zh: 外公外婆居然有一辆！

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Dude there's, like, a lot of handcuffs in here.
translation.zh: 这里有好多手铐

translation.en: OK, OK. [gasps]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Your mom is getting cooler by, like, the second.
translation.zh: 你妈越来越酷了

translation.en: [Clancy] Is this hers?
translation.zh: 这是她的？

translation.en: Whoa! Look at this! Look, it's a lollipop knife!
translation.zh: 哇！看看这个！是棒棒糖刀！

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [Clancy] What do we think?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: -You need to take off that jacket. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你得把这件外套脱下来

translation.en: -Because I'm falling in love with you. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 要不我要爱上你了

translation.en: What's this do?
translation.zh: 这是干嘛的？

translation.en: -Let's not touch that! -[Lewis] Um, yeah.
translation.zh: -还是别碰了-对

translation.en: -There's stuff in the pockets. -What?
translation.zh: -等等 口袋里有东西-什么？

translation.en: -[Mim gasps] -[Clancy] Oh, my God! Is that my mom?
translation.zh: 神啊！这是我妈吗？

translation.en: -[Mim] Oh! -She won't even let me dye my hair.
translation.zh: 她都不允许我染发！

translation.en: What is...?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: -Who's William? -[Clancy] I don't know.
translation.zh: （威廉） 威廉是谁？ 不知道 不过他的电话少了最后一位

translation.en: It's missing the last digit of his phone number.
translation.zh: 不知道 不过他的电话少了最后一位

translation.en: There's an address. Maybe we can find him there.
translation.zh: 还有一个地址也许我们能在这里找到他

translation.en: It's all the way in the city, though.
translation.zh: 不过很远 在市里

translation.en: How are we gonna get there? None of us have a license.
translation.zh: 咱们怎么去市里呢？咱们都没有驾照

translation.en: Honestly, even if we did, Cape traffic on Friday is a nightmare.
translation.zh: 说实话 即便有驾照周五鳕鱼角的交通也很恐怖

translation.en: -That's, like, three hours. -But it's only 30 nautical miles.
translation.zh: -要开三个小时-但是才30海里罢了

translation.en: Junior Marine Biologist Camp.
translation.zh: 参加过少年海洋生物学度假营

translation.en: Thirty miles. We could do that, right? Oh, but we need a boat.
translation.zh: 30海里 我们可以的 对吧？噢 不过我们需要一条船

translation.en: I know someone who has a boat.
translation.zh: 我知道有人有船

translation.en: -No. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不行-行的

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
translation.zh: -不行-行的

translation.en: -Mim! -Clancy!
translation.zh: -小米！-克兰西

translation.en: -Are you insane? -Are you insane?
translation.zh: -你疯了吗？-你疯了吗？

translation.en: We're doing this.
translation.zh: 就这样办

translation.en: -Mim, you know I can't do this. -We have to! You have to do this!
translation.zh: -小米 你知道我不能这样做-必须这样办 你必须这样！

translation.en: -You're crazy! -[in Spanish] Shut up!
translation.zh: 你疯了！ 闭嘴！

translation.en: [in English] It's to save your parents.
translation.zh: 是为了救你父母

translation.en: And maybe to get a boyfriend.
translation.zh: 也许再找个男朋友

translation.en: I'm not doing this.
translation.zh: 我不去

translation.en: Boys, you comin'?
translation.zh: 小伙子们 你们来吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we're just gettin' some gear.
translation.zh: 来的 我们拿点装备

translation.en: OK, how about this?
translation.zh: 好吧？这个怎么样？

translation.en: -[Lewis] It's just a pen. -Ah, you're right. I'll go put it back.
translation.zh: 就一支笔嘛 哦 你说得对 我放回去

translation.en: A pen that shoots lasers!
translation.zh: 能发射激光的笔！

translation.en: Score!
translation.zh: 赞！

translation.en: Put that thing down, OK? Quit touching stuff! Let's go!
translation.zh: 把那东西放下来 好吗？别乱碰东西了！走吧！

translation.en: [Lewis] We might need this.
translation.zh: 可能会需要这个

translation.en: How you gonna get us to Boston? You have your permit, not your license.
translation.zh: 你怎么把我们送去波士顿呢？ 你只有实习驾照 没有正式驾照

translation.en: You've driven dad's van twice, and almost killed us twice.
translation.zh: 你开了爸的面包车两次差点把大家害死两次

translation.en: OK, I did not almost kill us…
translation.zh: 我没有差点把大家害死

translation.en: the second time.
translation.zh: 第二次

translation.en: It's fine! I got this. I'm a great driver.
translation.zh: 没事 我能行 我开车技术很好！

translation.en: Also, that wig is awful. Please take it off.
translation.zh: 还有 这假发太难看了 请摘下来

translation.en: Oh, you're right. I don't look good as a redhead.
translation.zh: 噢 你说得对 我红发不好看

translation.en: -Hey! -Oh, what's this button do? -[girls] No-- -[engine roars]
translation.zh: -哎 这个按钮是干嘛的？-不要 等等…

translation.en: -[Clancy] What? -[automated voice] Predator mode engaged.
translation.zh: -啊？神啊！-捕食者模式已启动

translation.en: State your destination.
translation.zh: 说出目的地

translation.en: -[Mim] What are you doing? -[Clancy] Kevin! Oh my God!
translation.zh: -干嘛啊？好…-神啊！干嘛啊？

translation.en: Are you guys kid--
translation.zh: 你们是不是疯…

translation.en: Slow down!
translation.zh: 慢点！

translation.en: I'm not doing anything! It's, like, driving by itself!
translation.zh: 我什么都没做！车自己在开！

translation.en: I'm not allowed to drive in Predator mode!
translation.zh: 我不准开捕食者模式！

translation.en: I'm too handsome to die!
translation.zh: 我太帅了 不能死！

translation.en: We're good, we're good. [sighs] OK.
translation.zh: 咱们没事 好了

translation.en: -[distant party music] -[Mim] Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: -No, Kevin, why are you getting out? -We're coming!
translation.zh: -别下车 凯文 你下车干嘛？-我们也来！

translation.en: -[screams] -[Clancy] You're not.
translation.zh: 你们不能参加这个派对

translation.en: -Stay here! -It's dark outside. And don't push any more buttons. OK?
translation.zh: 留在这里 别乱按按钮了 好吗？

translation.en: -[Kevin] But it's dark! -We need to go.
translation.zh: -不过很黑啊！-咱们得走了

translation.en: Oh my God, there's so many people.
translation.zh: 天哪！好多人

translation.en: Mim. Whoa, Mim, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 小米 你干嘛？

translation.en: -We have to figure out what to say-- -We'll say, "Give us your boat."
translation.zh: -我们得想一下怎么说…-我们就说：“把你的船给我们”

translation.en: -You can't just go-- -Act natural.
translation.zh: -不能直接这样…-自然一点 没事的

translation.en: -No! I'll embarrass myself. -Have fun! It's fine.
translation.zh: -下水 好好玩 酷一点-太丢脸了

translation.en: [Mim] Travis.
translation.zh: 特拉维斯

translation.en: Hey. You came.
translation.zh: 哎 你来了

translation.en: Hey. Cool party. [laughs]
translation.zh: 哎 派对很酷啊

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: OK, we need to get to Boston.
translation.zh: 好的 我们要去波士顿

translation.en: -What? -[Emma] Well, well, well. If it isn't Clancy Finch.
translation.zh: -什么？-哇哇哇 克兰西·芬奇来了

translation.en: Didn't think you had it in you to show up to a seniors' party.
translation.zh: 没想到你会来高三的派对

translation.en: I just thought, once a band nerd, always a band nerd.
translation.zh: 我还以为“一日乐队呆子 终身乐队呆子”呢

translation.en: -Hey, Mim, nice outfit. -Really? Yours is terrible.
translation.zh: -你好 小米 衣服不错-真的？你的太难看了

translation.en: -Mm... Thanks. -[Kevin] Hey! What's up?
translation.zh: -谢谢-哎 你好！

translation.en: [girl] Hey, little man, what's up?
translation.zh: 哎 小家伙 你好

translation.en: My God. Did you bring your little brother to the party?
translation.zh: 等等 天哪！你把弟弟带来派对？

translation.en: -[Kevin] Call me. -[Emma] So weird. How'd you get here? Your mom drop you off?
translation.zh: 太古怪了 你们怎么来的？妈妈送来的？

translation.en: No, she got kidnapped by ninjas.
translation.zh: 不是 妈妈被忍者绑架了

translation.en: And she drove us here in a super cool car.
translation.zh: 她开一辆超酷的车带我们来的

translation.en: [chuckles] Wait. Aren't you the dancing dork from the bathroom?
translation.zh: 等等 你就是那个在洗手间跳舞的傻瓜吧？

translation.en: [giggles] Yeah, he's so weird.
translation.zh: 对 他很古怪

translation.en: Alright.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: OK. Hi. Hello. Yeah, we need to get across the bay to the city. It's urgent.
translation.zh: 好的 你好 我们需要穿过海湾去市里 很急

translation.en: You can't just drive across the bay at night.
translation.zh: 半夜没办法穿过海湾

translation.en: Yuh-huh. Me and my brothers go across all the time to go night fishing.
translation.zh: 可以的 我和兄弟们经常半夜穿过海湾去海钓

translation.en: -It's totally cool. -Yeah, we could take you. Right, Joey?
translation.zh: -完全没问题-对 可以带上你们 好吗 乔伊？

translation.en: Whatever then. Have fun with band nerd and the freak fest.
translation.zh: 那随便吧 和乐队呆子还有节日怪人好好玩吧

translation.en: Love you, too.
translation.zh: 也爱你

translation.en: -We're gonna prep the boat now. -[Clancy] OK.
translation.zh: -我们现在去备船-好的

translation.en: You go "prep the boat."
translation.zh: 你们去备船

translation.en: Uh, do you guys have proper flotation safety devices?
translation.zh: 你们有正规的救生设施吗？

translation.en: -[Travis] Definitely not. -[Joey] No.
translation.zh: -几乎完全没有-没有

translation.en: Alright, here's what's gonna happen. Baxter will run intel. I'm interference.
translation.zh: 好的 这样 巴克斯特做情报工作 我掩护

translation.en: You two, Count and Countess Van Der Holt of Belgium…
translation.zh: 你们俩 比利时的范德霍特伯爵夫妇

translation.en: secure the crown.
translation.zh: 去拿王冠

translation.en: Escape routes are here on the east side through the ladies' room vents.
translation.zh: 逃跑路线在东边这里通过女厕的通风管道离开

translation.en: Get the Queen there and the crown's an easy grab.
translation.zh: 在洗手间拿下王后王冠就是囊中之物

translation.en: You got rid of your tattoo?
translation.zh: 你把纹身去掉了？

translation.en: A tattoo? You said that was a birthmark.
translation.zh: 纹身？你说是胎记

translation.en: You both had the same tattoo?
translation.zh: 你俩有相同的纹身？

translation.en: -Um... -[woman] Get ready.
translation.zh: 作好准备

translation.en: Wheels up in ten.
translation.zh: 十分钟后出发

translation.en: -Honey, you said that was a birthmark. -I didn't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你之前说是胎记 亲爱的 当时不知该怎么说 对不起

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -The...
translation.zh: 亲爱的 当时不知该怎么说 对不起

translation.en: -You thinking the Vermeer in Dubai? -[Margot] Exactly.
translation.zh: -就像迪拜偷弗美尔画那样来？-没错

translation.en: Make the Queen sick, corner her in the bathroom.
translation.zh: 让王后中毒 然后在洗手间拿下她

translation.en: [Ron] Dubai?
translation.zh: 迪拜？

translation.en: You... you went to Dubai?
translation.zh: 你们去过迪拜？

translation.en: OK, that's it!
translation.zh: 好吧 够了！

translation.en: I wanna know what the both of you are involved in, right now!
translation.zh: 我要知道你俩做过什么 现在说！

translation.en: -Rob… -Ron.
translation.zh: -罗伯-罗恩

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Look, we were just a couple of dumb broke kids
translation.zh: 我们当时只是一对傻傻的穷孩子

translation.en: looking for a bigger life and... I just wanted it the easy way.
translation.zh: 在寻找更好的生活 我当时想抄近路

translation.en: I got us involved with Jean-Paul Deauxville.
translation.zh: 因为我我们和尚保罗·多维尔扯上了关系

translation.en: Jean-Paul... [garbling]. -Jean-Paul Deauxville. -Jean-Paul... [garbling]. -Deauxville. -Jean-Paul... [garbling].
translation.zh: -尚保罗·多维尔-保罗·多维…

translation.en: -OK. -I'm saying what you're saying.
translation.zh: -好的-我跟你说的一样

translation.en: Yeah, close enough.
translation.zh: 嗯 挺接近了

translation.en: He's a very dangerous, very connected man. Big-time smuggler and trafficker.
translation.zh: 他是非常危险、非常有人脉的人 走私大佬

translation.en: You guys are smugglers?
translation.zh: 你们是走私犯？

translation.en: Of... drugs?
translation.zh: 贩毒？

translation.en: [Margot] No, honey, don't worry. Nothing like that.
translation.zh: 不是 亲爱的 别担心 不是这种的

translation.en: I was a thief of expensive things.
translation.zh: 我以前是贼 偷值钱的东西

translation.en: Very expensive things.
translation.zh: 非常值钱的东西

translation.en: Priceless artifacts we'd sell on the black market.
translation.zh: 价值连城的艺术品我们会拿去黑市卖

translation.en: Mathilde… was the best of the best.
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔德是高手中的高手

translation.en: [Margot chuckles] OK, that's not-- I was not the best.
translation.zh: 好了 我没那么厉害

translation.en: You stole the Sultan of Brunei's favorite polo pony during the polo match.
translation.zh: 你在马球比赛中偷走了文莱苏丹最喜爱的马球马

translation.en: [Margot chuckles] OK. Well, yeah, that… that was good.
translation.zh: 好吧 那次倒是很精彩

translation.en: What a fun walk down memory lane,
translation.zh: 回忆真温馨啊

translation.en: when you both were big fat lying smugglers.
translation.zh: 当时你们俩是大骗子盗贼

translation.en: -Y-y-you're right, Ross. -My name is Ron!
translation.zh: -你说得对 罗斯-我叫罗恩！

translation.en: The point is, it was dangerous and illegal.
translation.zh: 重点是 当时很危险 而且是违法的

translation.en: -It was all my fault. -Ron.
translation.zh: -都怪我-罗恩

translation.en: -[Margot] We were wrong. -[Leo] You opened my eyes.
translation.zh: -我们俩都不对-但是你打开了我的眼界

translation.en: She convinced me that we had to get out. Witness Protection was the only option.
translation.zh: 是她说服了我得金盆洗手 证人保护计划是唯一的选择

translation.en: [Margot] Our testimonies put Jean-Paul behind bars, where he belongs.
translation.zh: 我们的证言使尚保罗坐了牢 他活该

translation.en: We did the right thing.
translation.zh: 我们的做法是对的

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: But it cost me everything.
translation.zh: 但那是我失去了一切

translation.en: I'm coming with you.
translation.zh: 我跟你一起去

translation.en: -What? -I'm going with you.
translation.zh: -什么？不行-我跟你去

translation.en: -I'm not gonna leave you-- -No! Absolutely not. It's too dangerous.
translation.zh: -我不会抛下你…-不行！绝对不行 太危险了

translation.en: -No, he could be useful. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 不 可能用得着他 -谢谢-声东击西

translation.en: -As a diversion. -Oh!
translation.zh: -谢谢-声东击西

translation.en: Especially if another situation like Romania happens.
translation.zh: 尤其是如果出现意外就像罗马尼亚那次一样

translation.en: -Romania? When did you go to Romania? -Honey, no--
translation.zh: -罗马尼亚？时候去了罗马尼亚？-亲爱的 不是

translation.en: Listen. Hear that?
translation.zh: 听我说 听到了吗？

translation.en: It's a helo. We're taking a helo. You don't have Dramamine.
translation.zh: 是直升机 我们坐直升机去你没带晕车药

translation.en: -What about your motion sickness? -I don't get motion sickness. This is...
translation.zh: -你晕机怎么办？-我不会晕机 这真是…

translation.en: [Margot] Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 你晕机的 上次坐游轮

translation.en: Remember, in the cabin, throwing up for four days on the cruise?
translation.zh: 你晕机的 上次坐游轮 你在船舱里吐了四天 忘了吗？

translation.en: For the last time, that was the King Neptune's potato salad.
translation.zh: 上次是因为海神王的土豆沙拉

translation.en: You don't make a mayonnaise-based side dish,
translation.zh: 蛋黄酱做的小菜放上六个小时再给别人吃

translation.en: leave it out for six hours and expect no repercussions.
translation.zh: 蛋黄酱做的小菜放上六个小时再给别人吃 一定会吃出问题

translation.en: Guys, I'm really at home on the open water! Loving this.
translation.zh: 我太适应海上的环境了！爱了！

translation.en: -Is he OK? -He gets seasick like his dad.
translation.zh: 他没事吧？ 他和他爸一样晕船

translation.en: [man] U.S. Coast Guard.
translation.zh: 我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭引擎

translation.en: Cut your engine and prepare for immediate boarding of your vessel.
translation.zh: 我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭引擎 准备我方立刻登船

translation.en: -Repeat, U.S. Coast Guard. Cut your... -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Uh, Travis, what's happening?
translation.zh: -重复 我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭…-特拉维斯 怎么了？

translation.en: I don't exactly have my license, so, uh… we might get arrested now.
translation.zh: 我其实没有驾照 所以我们可能会被捕

translation.en: -What? -What do you mean we might get arrested?
translation.zh: -什么？-什么叫我们可能会被捕？

translation.en: We can't get arrested! We have to find my mom!
translation.zh: 我们不能被捕！我们得去找我妈！

translation.en: We can stall them, say we were messing around, got lost.
translation.zh: 我和乔伊拖住他们 说我们在瞎转悠 迷路了

translation.en: You guys can swim.
translation.zh: 你们可以游过去

translation.en: -I mean… -No way!
translation.zh: -要不…-绝对不行！

translation.en: I-I we don't have a choice, guys!
translation.zh: 咱们也没办法啊

translation.en: It's dark so they won't see you, but you gotta hurry.
translation.zh: 很黑 他们看不见你们 但是得快点

translation.en: OK. Are there things in there that can, like, eat us?
translation.zh: -水里有没有东西会把我们吃掉？-没有！

translation.en: -No. -Come on, you guys gotta go.
translation.zh: 拜托 赶紧走

translation.en: Clancy, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 克兰西 你干嘛？

translation.en: -[Clancy] We have to do this, guys. -No! Don't!
translation.zh: 必须游 不要！

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: -Guys, come on. -[Lewis screams]
translation.zh: 快啊！

translation.en: -[Clancy] Hurry! Jump! -I don't think I can, Kev.
translation.zh: -快点跳！-我不行 凯文

translation.en: We can do this, together.
translation.zh: 咱们行的 一起跳

translation.en: -[Clancy] Hurry! Jump! -It'll be fine.
translation.zh: -快跳！-会没事的

translation.en: -[man] This is the U.S. Coast Guard. -Come on, guys. Hurry up!
translation.zh: -我们是美国海岸警卫队-快跳！

translation.en: -[siren blaring] -[Kevin] You got this, Mim.
translation.zh: -准备…-你没问题的 小米

translation.en: One. Two…
translation.zh: 一 二

translation.en: -Three! -[Mim screams]
translation.zh: 三！

translation.en: ♪ We won't leave until we get some So bring them right here ♪
translation.zh: 不拿到我们不会走 那就拿来吧…

translation.en: I never understood that.
translation.zh: 哎 从来都搞不懂 他们来 唱赞歌

translation.en: They come, sing carols, demand cookies, they don't leave until they get 'em.
translation.zh: 哎 从来都搞不懂 他们来 唱赞歌  要饼干 不拿到 就不走

translation.en: Where's the Christmas spirit in that? It's just plain extortion.
translation.zh: 这里面有什么圣诞精神？就是敲诈嘛

translation.en: -Do you know what I mean? -[growls]
translation.zh: 知道我的意思吗？

translation.en: OK, calm down. We are gonna be friends. Right? We're fr... Oh, look.
translation.zh: 好的 冷静 咱们做朋友 好吗？看看

translation.en: Ha! Cupcakes, huh?
translation.zh: 杯蛋糕 是吧？

translation.en: You want cupcakes? Let's get some cupcakes.
translation.zh: 你想吃杯蛋糕吗？咱们吃点杯蛋糕

translation.en: Get that... [grunts]
translation.zh: 去拿…

translation.en: There will be a receiving line for the King and Queen in the grand ballroom.
translation.zh: 大宴会厅里 会列队欢迎国王和王后

translation.en: Leo, you install the poison strip on Mathilde's right palm.
translation.zh: 利奥 把毒药带贴到玛蒂尔德右手掌

translation.en: Mathilde, once you shake the Queen's hand and transfer the poison to her,
translation.zh: 玛蒂尔德 你和王后握手毒药会粘到她手上

translation.en: the oils will absorb into her skin.
translation.zh: 渗入她的皮肤

translation.en: You'll have approximately three minutes before she gets sick.
translation.zh: 毒药会在大约三分钟后发作

translation.en: She won't die, but she'll feel pretty awful for a while.
translation.zh: 她不会死 但是会有一阵子非常难受

translation.en: Make sure nothing and no one besides the Queen touches that right hand.
translation.zh: 除了王后 不能让别人碰你的右手

translation.en: Honey, are you sure you're alright?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你真的没事吗？

translation.en: That helicopter ride really did a number on you.
translation.zh: 坐直升机确实把你伤得不轻

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 噢 没有 我没事

translation.en: -Are you sure you're OK? -No, I'm-I'm totally fine. I'm...
translation.zh: -真的没事？-对 我完全没事 完全…

translation.en: -Are you gonna... -[swallows]
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: [burps] Yeah, I swallowed it.
translation.zh: 嗯 吞下去了

translation.en: I just need bread to settle my stomach. They're gonna have food at this thing?
translation.zh: 我要吃点面包垫垫胃 那里会有东西吃 对吧？

translation.en: Uh, we're not really going to have time to eat tonight, Roy.
translation.zh: 咱们今晚没时间吃东西 莱恩

translation.en: Yeah, Ron!
translation.zh: 罗恩

translation.en: It's Ron, Leo.
translation.zh: 他叫罗恩 利奥

translation.en: And I'm not talking about a sit-down dinner, Leo, OK?
translation.zh: 我不是说要坐下来吃大餐 利奥

translation.en: I'm talking about appetizers, or like, a little dip.
translation.zh: 我是说前菜 随便吃一点

translation.en: You know, I just think it's real interesting
translation.zh: 我觉得这很有趣

translation.en: that you happen to find a sleek-fitting tuxedo in that bag of yours,
translation.zh: 你居然刚好能在你包里找到一套合身的燕尾服

translation.en: but here I am, looking like… like a hobo's butler.
translation.zh: 而我却像一个流浪汉管家

translation.en: Oh, and it's hot like a Berber carpet.
translation.zh: 而且热得像柏柏尔人的地毯

translation.en: [Leo] You know what?
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: Next time the three of us plan a heist together,
translation.zh: 下次咱们三个一起偷东西

translation.en: I'll make sure we pack more options for you, Raj.
translation.zh: 我一定给你多带几件衣服选 罗杰

translation.en: At this point, I know you know that it's Ron.
translation.zh: 现在我知道了 你知道我叫罗恩

translation.en: Baxter has eyes on you. Don't get cute.
translation.zh: 巴克斯特在看着你们 别刷小聪明

translation.en: [Ron] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: -[Clancy grunting] -[Mim] Why are we doing this?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这样？

translation.en: -[Clancy] That wasn't so bad. -[Mim] That was bad.
translation.zh: -还好吧-不好

translation.en: -[all panting] -[Mim] That was really bad.
translation.zh: 太不好了

translation.en: Hey! You're a really good swimmer, Kev.
translation.zh: 你游得真好 凯文

translation.en: Thanks. I played Jaws in Jaws.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我在《大白鲨》里演过大白鲨

translation.en: Kevin, shut up. No, you didn't. You're so weird.
translation.zh: 凯文 闭嘴吧 别胡扯 你太古怪了

translation.en: OK, seriously, he just, like,
translation.zh: 好的 说真的

translation.en: swam that whole way with me on his back.
translation.zh: 差不多是他背着我游过来的

translation.en: So, maybe, let's not be mean right now.
translation.zh: 所以 咱们现在别刻薄他了

translation.en: My entire life flashed before my eyes back there.
translation.zh: 刚才我的一生都在我眼前闪现

translation.en: -[panting] Kev? -[whispers] Yeah?
translation.zh: -凯文？-嗯？

translation.en: It was really short... and really boring.
translation.zh: 太短了 太没劲了

translation.en: -[sighs] -Lewis... What is it?
translation.zh: 呃

translation.en: I just felt boob on my back.
translation.zh: 我感觉到奶子贴在我背上

translation.en: I think that's first base.
translation.zh: 这应该算是到一垒了

translation.en: Totally worth it, dude.
translation.zh: 太值了

translation.en: -[Clancy] Is your underwear beeping? -No. Is yours?
translation.zh: -是你的内衣在叫吗？-不是 是你的吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: It was from bay water. They've clearly malfunctioned.
translation.zh: 是因为海水 明显是故障了

translation.en: Oh my God, bay water! Ew! Why are we sitting here talking? My God! Ew!
translation.zh: 天哪！海水 恶心！咱们坐这里聊什么啊？天哪！

translation.en: No, no, I can't. I literally cannot. We have to change right now.
translation.zh: 不行 真的不行 咱们现在得换衣服

translation.en: -There's a gift shop. Let's go in there. -Ooh, OK!
translation.zh: 那边有一家礼品店 咱们进去 好的

translation.en: Hey, dude, we should check that out.
translation.zh: 哎 看看这个

translation.en: Passports.
translation.zh: 护照

translation.en: Welcome, Count and Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临 范德霍特伯爵夫妇

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 这位是？

translation.en: [in French accent] This is our personal secretary,
translation.zh: 这位是我们的私人秘书

translation.en: Suzanne. -Su... [sighs]
translation.zh: 苏珊娜 -苏…-苏珊娜

translation.en: Suzanne.
translation.zh: -苏…-苏珊娜

translation.en: Hello! Haw, haw, haw.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [in bad French accent] Yeah, Suzanne is my family name,
translation.zh: 对 苏珊娜是我的姓

translation.en: but, eh, my friends, they call me… Frankie Fromage,
translation.zh: 但是我的朋友们叫我奶酪弗兰基

translation.en: because cheese is so strong, and I am strong, like cheese.
translation.zh: 因为奶酪很强 我像奶酪一样强

translation.en: I am a little bit more than a "secretary," yes?
translation.zh: 我可不止是秘书哦

translation.en: [in English] Yes, I am their bodyguard because I can punch, and my hands
translation.zh: 对 我是他们的保镖 因为我会打拳我的手是致命武器 小心了

translation.en: are lethal weapons, you know, so watch out for me.
translation.zh: 因为我会打拳我的手是致命武器 小心了

translation.en: I will... [yelps]
translation.zh: 我会打…

translation.en: -Oh! -[man] Whoa! -Step back. -[Ron mutters]
translation.zh: 哎 退后

translation.en: He will pay for this. He is a count. He is very wealthy.
translation.zh: 他会赔 他是伯爵 非常有钱

translation.en: So put it on his tab. Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 挂在他的账上 你们带我去哪里？

translation.en: It's just a precaution. He's not on the list.
translation.zh: 以防万一 他不在名单上

translation.en: Once my men are done searching him, he'll join you both inside.
translation.zh: 我的人搜完之后他会在里面和你们汇合

translation.en: Be as thorough as you need.
translation.zh: 尽管彻底搜查

translation.en: -Where'd they go? -I don't know. [sighs]
translation.zh: -他们上哪儿去了？-不知道

translation.en: What are you wearing?
translation.zh: 你们穿的什么啊？

translation.en: We brought you guys cloaks.
translation.zh: 我们给你们拿了斗篷

translation.en: -[chuckles] -We are not wearing those.
translation.zh: 我们不穿这个

translation.en: -OK, it's cold. I'll make it work. -[man] Whoa, whoa, hey!
translation.zh: 好吧 很冷 穿了再说 哎哎哎！

translation.en: Where'd you kids get those costumes, huh? You stay right there! I'm comin' down!
translation.zh: 你们这帮孩子哪儿拿的道具服装？ 别动 我下来了

translation.en: Shoot! Come on! And take off the wigs. You look ridiculous.
translation.zh: 糟糕！快走！假发摘掉 太可笑了

translation.en: But the hats make us look older?
translation.zh: 但帽子会让我们看起来大一点吗？

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 肯定的

translation.en: What? It's just a dry cleaner's. Where's Carp and Clam?
translation.zh: 什么啊？这是洗衣店鲤鱼与蛤蜊餐厅在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, excuse me. Do you know where Carp and Clam is?
translation.zh: 噢 不好意思知道鲤鱼与蛤蜊餐厅在哪里吗？

translation.en: -[man] The bar? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -酒吧？-是的

translation.en: Uh, this used to be it. They had a fire. Closed down maybe six years ago.
translation.zh: 以前是在这里的发生了火灾 大概六年前关了

translation.en: [Mim] OK. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: -What are we supposed to do now? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -咱们现在怎么办？-不知道

translation.en: Guys, look. What's that thing Mom's always saying?
translation.zh: 哎 妈妈总说什么来着？

translation.en: "Stop wiping boogers everywhere?"
translation.zh: 别把鼻屎擦得到处都是？

translation.en: Ew, no. The other thing. About the library?
translation.zh: 恶心 不是 另一句 关于图书馆的

translation.en: Oh! She's always talking about
translation.zh: 噢！她总是说自己经常去图书馆

translation.en: how she always went to the library, 'cause she had no friends.
translation.zh: 噢！她总是说自己经常去图书馆 因为她没有朋友

translation.en: She's just trying to trick me into reading. I'm not falling for it.
translation.zh: 她是为了骗我看书 我才不上当

translation.en: William is the dead poet guy she's always quoting.
translation.zh: 威廉是她总是引用的已故诗人

translation.en: Guys, this is Mom's library, and this number,
translation.zh: 这是妈妈的图书馆 这个数字

translation.en: it's not a phone number, it's a Dewey decimal system.
translation.zh: 不是手机号是杜威十进制图书分类法

translation.en: It's a call number for a library book. Come on!
translation.zh: -是图书馆书籍的编号-走吧！

translation.en: It's locked.
translation.zh: 锁了

translation.en: How are we gonna get in?
translation.zh: 咱么怎么进去？

translation.en: That's convenient.
translation.zh: 来得正好

translation.en: OK, um, think...
translation.zh: 呃 开动脑筋

translation.en: I don't know who Dewey is, but his system sucks.
translation.zh: 我不知道杜威是谁不过他的分类法太烂了

translation.en: Got it. Top floor. OK.
translation.zh: 有了 顶楼

translation.en: Maybe there's some kind of message written inside the books.
translation.zh: 也许书里有什么信息

translation.en: Oh my God. So we have to read all of these?
translation.zh: 天哪！咱们得把这些都看完？

translation.en: -[Clancy sighs] -[Mim] No. No way.
translation.zh: 不可能的

translation.en: This is where the book's supposed to be. It's gone!
translation.zh: 书应该在这里 没了！

translation.en: Maybe that Henry guy was right. Maybe this is a job for the police.
translation.zh: 也许亨利说得对 也许是应该让警察来查

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: That's William Butler Yeats. That's her favorite.
translation.zh: 这是威廉·巴特勒·叶芝她最喜欢的诗人

translation.en: I mean, that can't be a coincidence.
translation.zh: 这不可能是巧合

translation.en: Maybe we're not supposed to find a book, maybe we're supposed to find… this?
translation.zh: 也许不是要我们找书而是要找这个？

translation.en: "Although you hide in the ebb and flow of the pale tide when the moon has set,
translation.zh: 月落时 虽然你躲在白浪中

translation.en: the people of coming days will know about the casting of my net."
translation.zh: 但未来的人会知道我曾抛出了网

translation.en: Dude, your mom is into some Da Vinci Code stuff.
translation.zh: 哎 你妈真喜欢达芬奇密码这些东西

translation.en: [sighs] What are we looking for?
translation.zh: 要找什么？

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -What's that? -It's Mom's. I brought it.
translation.zh: -等等 这是什么？-是妈妈的 我带了来

translation.en: No. Nope. No, no. No.
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Not doin' it. Not doin' the stairs of doom tonight. No.
translation.zh: 不进去 今晚不走下死亡楼梯
