translation.en: Whatever's down there is gonna lead to my parents.
translation.zh: 下面的东西一定会带我们找到我父母

translation.en: Will it? Will it? Or is this the part where the four spunky kids
translation.zh: 会吗？四个充满勇气的孩子

translation.en: go headfirst into the scary, dark unknown.
translation.zh: 一往直前冲进恐怖而黑暗的未知世界

translation.en: And she's getting the stool.
translation.zh: 她在拿凳子了

translation.en: Oh my God. Don't do this.
translation.zh: 天哪！别这样

translation.en: I don't think we should do this. I think this is a bad idea.
translation.zh: 我觉得咱们不该下去 我觉得不好

translation.en: Now the children are getting in.
translation.zh: 孩子们都进去了

translation.en: I don't want this! I don't want this adventure!
translation.zh: 我不想下去 我不想去冒险！

translation.en: No, no, no. Oh my God, no.
translation.zh: 不行 天哪！

translation.en: [Kevin] Where's my night-light when I need it?
translation.zh: 我的电筒怎么需要的时候找不到了？

translation.en: -Give me it! -[Lewis growls]
translation.zh: 你的电筒给我

translation.en: Don't worry, we... we got this!
translation.zh: 放心 没问题的

translation.en: [Mim] Ugh, gross.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: Ah! What is that? Satan? No! I hate that. I hate that.
translation.zh: 是什么啊？撒旦？ 别来！我讨厌这东西

translation.en: I hate this. I hate this tunnel. What is this? Where are we?
translation.zh: 我讨厌这个隧道 这是什么啊？这是哪里？

translation.en: -We should not be down here right now. -[echoing rumble]
translation.zh: 我们现在不应该在这下面

translation.en: I mean, OK, look, I know,
translation.zh: 我知道 今天夜里很离谱

translation.en: this night's been insane, and we might not make it out of this tunnel alive--
translation.zh: 我知道 今天夜里很离谱 咱们也许不能活着走出这个隧道

translation.en: -Dude! -But, I mean, you... you're Mim.
translation.zh: -哎！-但你可是小米啊！

translation.en: -Yes? -You're not afraid of anything.
translation.zh: -所以呢？-你天不怕地不怕

translation.en: I mean, you're the bravest person I know. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你是我认识的最勇敢的人

translation.en: I can't do half of the stuff that you do.
translation.zh: 你做的事 我一半都做不到

translation.en: -Clancy, look where we are right now. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 克兰西 看看我们现在所在的地方

translation.en: We are walking through this dark, disgusting tunnel at your request,
translation.zh: 根据你的要求我们走在这个黑暗而恶心的隧道中

translation.en: in the worst all-nighter ever,
translation.zh: 这是最糟糕的通宵

translation.en: and we're doing it wearing the worst outfits on the planet.
translation.zh: 而且咱们还穿着世界上最糟糕的服装

translation.en: What is this? I hate these shorts. They come to such an unnatural length.
translation.zh: 这是什么啊？我讨厌这种中裤 长度特别不自然到了大腿的一半就没了

translation.en: They stop mid-thigh.
translation.zh: 长度特别不自然到了大腿的一半就没了

translation.en: -[laughs] -You want brave? Mid-thigh is brave.
translation.zh: 你要勇敢？穿这种中裤就是勇敢

translation.en: -Give me a hug. What are you doing? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 抱抱我 你干嘛呢？

translation.en: Aw, bring it in.
translation.zh: 噢 来吧

translation.en: Just bring it out. Just you two. Do your thang.
translation.zh: 释放出来吧 你们俩继续

translation.en: Spiderweb!
translation.zh: 蜘蛛网！

translation.en: Oh, man. That was a gookie one.
translation.zh: 哎！这个够恶心！

translation.en: Hate to see the monster that made that thing.
translation.zh: 很不喜欢看到做这东西的怪物

translation.en: Also, what is that?
translation.zh: 还有 那是什么啊？

translation.en: How was your cavity search?
translation.zh: 体腔检查怎么样？

translation.en: -Fun. -Need to find a way to reach Henry.
translation.zh: 很好玩 -得想办法联系亨利-不行 风险太大

translation.en: No, it's too risky. We just do what they want.
translation.zh: -得想办法联系亨利-不行 风险太大 咱们就按他们的要求办

translation.en: They'll disappear. Your family will be safe.
translation.zh: 他们会消失 你的家人就安全了

translation.en: Wait a second, who's Henry? Henry, your best friend from college?
translation.zh: 等等 亨利是谁？ 等等 亨利？你大学的闺蜜？

translation.en: Let me guess. You didn't go to college together?
translation.zh: 噢 我猜一下 你们不是大学同学？

translation.en: Honey, he's the U.S. Marshal assigned to my case.
translation.zh: 哎 亲爱的 他是办我案子的联邦法警

translation.en: He came over for Thanksgiving when Kevin was a baby.
translation.zh: 凯文小时候 他感恩节会过来

translation.en: I baked him cranberry cornbread, and he said he loved it.
translation.zh: 我给他做了蔓越莓玉米面包他说很喜欢吃

translation.en: It was a prescheduled home visit. He did love the cornbread. We all did.
translation.zh: 是预先安排好的家访 他是很喜欢吃玉米面包我们都很稀罕

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't he love the cornbread?
translation.zh: 嗯 怎么会不喜欢呢？

translation.en: Your Excellencies,
translation.zh: 阁下

translation.en: my wife, the Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: 我妻子 范德霍特伯爵夫人

translation.en: Very beautiful.
translation.zh: 非常美丽

translation.en: Yes, I'm a very lucky man.
translation.zh: 对 我很幸运

translation.en: I have never forgotten that.
translation.zh: 我从未忘记

translation.en: OK, that's it. That's it. That's it! Alright, we're going home.
translation.zh: 好了 可以了 好的 咱们回家

translation.en: It touched my mouth. What happens if it goes in my mouth?
translation.zh: 我碰了嘴巴 到我嘴巴里了 到我嘴巴里怎么办？

translation.en: Remember when Kevin drank a glow stick and poison control said to give him milk.
translation.zh: 凯文以前吃了荧光棒里的东西毒物控制署说要给他吃牛奶

translation.en: Can I get milk? I need some milk! Can I get some milk?
translation.zh: 能给我来点牛奶吗？我要喝牛奶！

translation.en: Please excuse our assistant, he has not been feeling well.
translation.zh: 请原谅我们的助理 -他不太舒服-食物中毒

translation.en: Food poisoning. [in French] Terrible.
translation.zh: -他不太舒服-食物中毒 -很可怕-脑子中毒了 没错

translation.en: -[Ron retching] -[in English] Poisoning of the brain.
translation.zh: -很可怕-脑子中毒了 没错

translation.en: -[Margot chuckles softly] -[sighs] You know, you know what?
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] I think I'm OK.
translation.zh: 我觉得应该没事了

translation.en: -I'm alright, I'm OK. -[they chuckle]
translation.zh: 我没事了

translation.en: -You know what? I think… I overreacted. -[Leo laughing]
translation.zh: 我反应过度了

translation.en: I've a strong immune system. I'm... I overreact a bit. Nice to meet...
translation.zh: 免疫系统很强大我反应过度了 幸会…

translation.en: Oh God... I think I'm OK.
translation.zh: 嗯 我应该没事

translation.en: -[retches] -[security] Move back!
translation.zh: -让开！-天哪！

translation.en: [Mim] It just looks like somebody's gross house.
translation.zh: 像是谁的家 很恶心

translation.en: What kind of freak would actually live down here?
translation.zh: 什么样的怪人会住在这下面？

translation.en: [woman] What kind of freaks would go snooping around when they didn't live here?
translation.zh: 什么样的怪人不住在这里却会到处窥探？

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 有道理

translation.en: -No! Kevin, no! -[woman] Start talking.
translation.zh: 凯文！别伤害他！ 说 你们怎么找到这里的？

translation.en: How did you find this place?
translation.zh: 说 你们怎么找到这里的？

translation.en: Our mom had a key! Her name's Margot Finch!
translation.zh: 我妈有一把钥匙 她叫玛戈特·芬奇

translation.en: Don't know her. Wrong answer.
translation.zh: 不认识 回答错误

translation.en: -[Kevin yelps] -No. Mathilde Tremblay!
translation.zh: 不对 玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱

translation.en: He means Mathilde Tremblay. I think she sent us here.
translation.zh: 他是说玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱应该是她让我们来这里的

translation.en: -How do you know Mathilde? -[Kevin] She's our mom!
translation.zh: -你们怎么会认识玛蒂尔德？-她是我们妈妈！

translation.en: I think she's our mom. Please don't hurt me.
translation.zh: 我想她是我们妈妈 请不要伤害我

translation.en: [woman] Oh, yeah. You have her eyes.
translation.zh: 对 你的眼睛和她一模一样

translation.en: So, you know her?
translation.zh: 你认识她？

translation.en: Yeah. We were like sisters.
translation.zh: 对 我们情同姐妹

translation.en: Wow. Mom is not like I thought she was.
translation.zh: 哇！没想到妈妈是这样的人

translation.en: Oh. Right.
translation.zh: 噢 对

translation.en: [sighs] I just got off a job.
translation.zh: 我刚下班

translation.en: Oh, where do you wo...
translation.zh: 你哪里…噢

translation.en: Oh, you... you stole that stuff.
translation.zh: 这是你偷来的

translation.en: Not like a big deal or anything. We steal stuff all the time, right?
translation.zh: 也不是什么大事我们也经常偷东西 对吧？

translation.en: One time, I took two puddings at lunch. I'm a real bad boy.
translation.zh: 有一次我一次就拿了两个布丁我是个很坏的孩子

translation.en: Kevin. Could you maybe just…
translation.zh: 凯文 能不能说一下你所知的我妈的情况？

translation.en: tell us everything you know about my mom?
translation.zh: 能不能说一下你所知的我妈的情况？

translation.en: We grew up together. Pulling jobs. Just kids' stuff, you know.
translation.zh: 我们一起长大 做事 孩子那些事

translation.en: Scamming tourists, pickpocketing, petty theft, your basic B and E.
translation.zh: 骗游客 小偷小摸 进屋里偷

translation.en: Your idea of "kid stuff" is, like, a lot different than ours.
translation.zh: 你说的孩子的事和我们想象中的区别很大

translation.en: Then we got mixed up in some bad stuff with this guy named Jean-Paul.
translation.zh: 后来有些不好的事 牵扯了尚保罗

translation.en: J-Jean-Paul! That's the guy Henry was talking about.
translation.zh: 尚保罗 亨利提过他的事

translation.en: He's in prison now, but his people, they came after my mom
translation.zh: 他现在在监狱但是他的人来找我妈

translation.en: and now they're planning this huge job, and we're trying to find her.
translation.zh: 现在他们在计划做一件大案 我们在想办法找到她

translation.en: What makes you think she wants to be found?
translation.zh: 你们为什么觉得她希望被找到？

translation.en: That necklace you're wearing.
translation.zh: 你的项链她留了一条一模一样的给我们

translation.en: She left us the same one to get down here.
translation.zh: 你的项链她留了一条一模一样的给我们 追踪到这里

translation.en: She left us tons of clues, they all led here.
translation.zh: 她给我们留下了很多线索引导我们到了这里

translation.en: I think she wanted us to find you so you could help us.
translation.zh: 我想她想要我们找到你 让你来帮我们？

translation.en: [woman] Your mom gave me something before she went into witness protection.
translation.zh: 你妈妈在进入证人保护计划之前给了我一样东西

translation.en: She said I would know if it ever came time to open it.
translation.zh: 她说时机到了就打开

translation.en: -[Clancy] What is that? -[Kevin] It's a pager.
translation.zh: 这是什么？ 传呼机

translation.en: My God, the olden days were tragic.
translation.zh: 天哪！以前太惨了

translation.en: It's not a pager.
translation.zh: 不是传呼机

translation.en: It's an old tracking device.
translation.zh: 是一台老的追踪装置

translation.en: [Ron] OK, I'm much better now.
translation.zh: 好的 我现在好多了

translation.en: Ahh... OK. Yeah. That's all. No more is comin'... [groans]
translation.zh: 好的 就这样了 没有了

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'm done.
translation.zh: 我应该吐完了

translation.en: Oof! Stay away from the seafood dip.
translation.zh: 别碰海鲜蘸酱

translation.en: If I'm giving advice, stay away from the seafood dip
translation.zh: 我建议别碰海鲜蘸酱

translation.en: because it's mayonnaise-based.
translation.zh: 因为是蛋黄酱做的

translation.en: So, it's just not a good call.
translation.zh: 不应该这样做

translation.en: So, just stay awa-- [groans]
translation.zh: 所以别碰…

translation.en: Mm, OK. [laughs] I thought it was coming out of both ends.
translation.zh: 我还以为两头都要喷

translation.en: But it didn't… [sighs] It didn't.
translation.zh: 不过没有

translation.en: We're good. Everybody, we're good.
translation.zh: 没事 各位 没事

translation.en: What happened to your accent?
translation.zh: 你的口音怎么没了？

translation.en: What happened to my...
translation.zh: 我的口…

translation.en: [in bad French accent] How dare you, sir?
translation.zh: 你怎么敢这么说 先生？

translation.en: What? Who? Sir!
translation.zh: 什么？谁？先生！

translation.en: How dare you... say something like that to me
translation.zh: 你怎么敢对我说这种话

translation.en: -in front of the royal family? -Save it.
translation.zh: -当着王室的面？-省省吧

translation.en: -Do what? -We put in a call to your consulate.
translation.zh: -干嘛？-我们给你们领事馆打了电话

translation.en: These... are fake.
translation.zh: 这些是假的

translation.en: There is no Count or Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: 不存在范德霍特伯爵或者伯爵夫人

translation.en: Well, what time did you call?
translation.zh: 等等 你是什么时候打的电话？

translation.en: -Maybe it was lunch and they-- -Keep on them.
translation.zh: -可能是午餐时间-看着他们

translation.en: -I'm gonna go and get this sorted out. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们可能去附近逛了-我去查清楚

translation.en: No, I'm saying, to get a croissant or…
translation.zh: 不是 我是说可能去拿羊角面包或者…

translation.en: Both ends.
translation.zh: 两头来了！

translation.en: Alright, she must have had a personal tracking device implanted on her in case something ever happened.
translation.zh: 她身上一定有追踪设备 以防万一

translation.en: The Grand Concert Hall downtown.
translation.zh: 大音乐厅

translation.en: Duran Duran! They said something about the Crown of Duran Duran!
translation.zh: 杜兰杜兰！他们提到了杜兰杜兰王冠！

translation.en: Durámuran? The Crown of Durámuran?
translation.zh: 杜兰木兰？杜兰木兰王冠？

translation.en: Oh, Lord... It's the Holy Grail.
translation.zh: 神啊！圣杯

translation.en: They've been tracking that for years.
translation.zh: 他们找这东西多年了

translation.en: Your mom and I tried to steal it from the Louvre. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我和你妈曾经想从卢浮宫偷这个王冠

translation.en: That's a good bedtime story.
translation.zh: 那是一个很好的睡前故事

translation.en: There's an event tonight at the Grand Concert Hall. A big gala.
translation.zh: 今天在大音乐厅有活动 大型狂欢

translation.en: You know what? If the crown is at that gala, so is your mom.
translation.zh: 如果王冠在那里 那你妈也在

translation.en: OK, great! Let's go!
translation.zh: 好的 很好 走吧！

translation.en: Um... no. I'll handle it. OK? You guys stay here. It's not a kids' job.
translation.zh: 不 我来处理 好吗？你们留在这里 这不是孩子做的事

translation.en: No. We have to go. We're not gonna get hurt, I promise.
translation.zh: 不行 我们得去我们不会受伤 我保证

translation.en: Aw, that's so sweet. I don't care if you get hurt.
translation.zh: 说得太好了 我不关心你们是否受伤

translation.en: You'll slow me down, blow my cover.
translation.zh: 你们会拖我的后腿 害我被发现了

translation.en: Uh, we're not slowing anybody down. We can blend in, right?
translation.zh: 我们不会拖后腿我们可以混进去 对吧？

translation.en: Is that so, General?
translation.zh: 是嘛 将军？

translation.en: Actually, this insignia is for the rank of commander.
translation.zh: 这个徽章其实是指挥官用的

translation.en: But historically correct facts are not important right now.
translation.zh: 但是正确的史实现在不重要

translation.en: Non-negotiable, OK?
translation.zh: 不容商量 好吧？

translation.en: Your mom sent you here so I would keep you safe, not send you off to get killed.
translation.zh: 你们妈妈让你们来这里是为了让我保护你们 不是让你们去送死 好好待着吧

translation.en: Make yourselves comfortable. There are video games, peanut butter…
translation.zh: 不是让你们去送死 好好待着吧 这里有电子游戏 花生酱

translation.en: -I'm allergic to peanuts. -Same.
translation.zh: -我对花生酱过敏-我也是

translation.en: [sighs] You're not coming.
translation.zh: 你们不准去

translation.en: OK, fine.
translation.zh: 好的 好吧

translation.en: But, uh, just out of curiosity, what is your plan?
translation.zh: 不过 出于好奇问一下你打算怎么办？

translation.en: I'll go into an air vent that'll lead me to the subway
translation.zh: 我会走通风管道进入地铁

translation.en: and take me directly to the Grand Concert Hall downtown.
translation.zh: 直接前往大音乐厅

translation.en: Anything else?
translation.zh: 还有别的事吗？

translation.en: Yeah, which vent was that?
translation.zh: 有的 哪个通风管道？

translation.en: [grunts] The one right over...
translation.zh: 那边…

translation.en: Please don't find me and kill me. I just need to get my mom back.
translation.zh: 请不要来追杀我我只是想把我妈救会来

translation.en: -Not bad. -[chuckles] Although I definitely will find you and kill you.
translation.zh: 不错啊 不过我一定会追杀你

translation.en: -You'll kill her, but we're cool, right? -Thanks, lady.
translation.zh: 你会杀她 但咱们之间没事 对吧？

translation.en: Oh! Come on!
translation.zh: 来！

translation.en: -I'm not allowed on public transport-- -We know!
translation.zh: 没有女性监护人陪同我不准坐公共交通 知道的！

translation.en: Where now?
translation.zh: 现在去哪里？

translation.en: -Um... This way! Come on. -[Kevin] OK!
translation.zh: -这边 来吧-好的

translation.en: [Mim] We're never getting past that security.
translation.zh: 咱们不可能过得了这些警卫

translation.en: I don't know about you guys, but we might be able to get in.
translation.zh: 你们我就不知道了不过我们可能进得去

translation.en: Have you seen yourself?
translation.zh: 你照过镜子了吗？

translation.en: Oh, you're right. It's the cravat.
translation.zh: 你说得对 领结很难看

translation.en: Hey, what about up there?
translation.zh: 哎 那上面呢？

translation.en: [Clancy] Window's open.
translation.zh: 窗户开着

translation.en: You'll never fit.
translation.zh: 你进不去的

translation.en: I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我来

translation.en: Oh, doesn't your mom have a rule about breaking into buildings at night?
translation.zh: 半夜闯入大楼你妈没对此立规矩吗？

translation.en: My mom is not here.
translation.zh: 我妈不在这里

translation.en: -He took off the cape. -OK.
translation.zh: -他把斗篷脱掉了-好的

translation.en: -[Lewis] Hold my hat. -Snap!
translation.zh: -拿好我的帽子-厉害！

translation.en: [groans] Come on, Lewis.
translation.zh: 加油 路易斯

translation.en: Make it happen, Lewis. [grunts]
translation.zh: 一定要上去 路易斯

translation.en: -You can give me a hand with this part. -[Mim] Right.
translation.zh: -帮一下忙啊-噢  好的 我们刚才在看

translation.en: -We were watching. -[Kevin] I had the hat.
translation.zh: -帮一下忙啊-噢  好的 我们刚才在看 抱歉

translation.en: -[Clancy] Sorry. There you go. OK -[Mim] There it is.
translation.zh: -我没事-行了

translation.en: [Kevin] You got this!
translation.zh: 没问题的

translation.en: -[Lewis grunts] -[Kevin] Squeeze! Squeeze!
translation.zh: 压一下

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Oh my God. Look at that.
translation.zh: 天哪！看

translation.en: -He's really doin' it- -[Lewis yelps]
translation.zh: 哇 他真的很厉害

translation.en: -[thud, clatter] -Uh-oh. It's OK. Walk it off.
translation.zh: -哎呀！-没事 撑住 你很厉害

translation.en: -You're good. -[Clancy chuckles]
translation.zh: 撑住 你很厉害

translation.en: -Does he know where to go? -I hope so.
translation.zh: -他知道该走哪边吗？-希望他知道

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hey! What are you guys doing back here?
translation.zh: 哎 你们在这里干嘛？

translation.en: Uh, we... We were just, um…
translation.zh: 我们在…呃…

translation.en: Oh my gosh, we've been wandering around this place forever.
translation.zh: 天哪！我们在这里转了半天了！

translation.en: So, uh, which way to the stage? Yeah, we just need to set up.
translation.zh: 舞台从哪边走？我们要布置一下

translation.en: Just got in from Denver. What a cluster that airport is. Am I right?
translation.zh: 刚从丹佛过来那机场真繁忙 是吧？

translation.en: Never been there.
translation.zh: 没去过

translation.en: We're the kid musical ensemble booked for tonight.
translation.zh: 我们是今晚预订的儿童乐团

translation.en: Paul Revere's Midnight Ride?
translation.zh: 保罗·里维尔的午夜之旅

translation.en: Never heard of us? We're pretty big on YouTube.
translation.zh: 没听过我们？我们在YouTube上很火的

translation.en: Mim, show him the video. The viral one.
translation.zh: 小米 给他看视频 火了的那个

translation.en: Two-point-three million hits and climbing.
translation.zh: 230万点击 而且还在增加

translation.en: Come on. You think we dress like this for kicks?
translation.zh: 拜托 我们没事会穿成这样吗？

translation.en: Alright, alright, come on.
translation.zh: 好 走吧

translation.en: [Kevin] Good evening. Tut-tut. We are Paul Revere's Midnight Ride.
translation.zh: 晚上好！ 我们是保罗·里维尔的午夜之旅乐团

translation.en: We have an amazing performance planned for everyone here.
translation.zh: 我们安排了精彩的演出给各位

translation.en: So, to kick the night off,
translation.zh: 今晚首先表演的是

translation.en: we have Cool Clancy on the cello.
translation.zh: 大提琴手克兰西

translation.en: -Let's strike up the band! -[tepid applause]
translation.zh: 演奏开始！

translation.en: [whispers] Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下

translation.en: [whispers] Kevin...
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: [whispers] No. [sighs] I can't... I'm not like you.
translation.zh: 不行 我不行 我不像你

translation.en: [sighs] I knew it. I knew it!
translation.zh: 我就知道！

translation.en: Uh... Security?
translation.zh: 保安

translation.en: We got a mess down here on the stage. Kids in pilgrim shoes.
translation.zh: 舞台上有麻烦 有孩子穿着粗跟鞋

translation.en: -[oboe squeaks] -Clancy, we need you to go. Now.
translation.zh: 克兰西 赶紧的

translation.en: I can't play in front of all these people.
translation.zh: 凯文 当着这么多人的面我没办法演奏

translation.en: Of course, you can. You got this! Quickly!
translation.zh: 当然可以 你没问题的 快点！

translation.en: -[sighs] I'm not ready. -Yes, you are.
translation.zh: 我还没准备好 你准备好了 你这么有天赋

translation.en: -You're so talented. -I need backup ASAP, please.
translation.zh: 你准备好了 你这么有天赋 请求立即增援 快下来这里有孩子穿着古装

translation.en: We got kids in puffy shirts. I need backup!
translation.zh: 请求立即增援 快下来这里有孩子穿着古装 请求增援！

translation.en: -Backup ASAP, please! Thank you. -Wait, wait.
translation.zh: -立即增援 谢谢！-等等

translation.en: Alright, we've got new orders to take 'em to the embassy.
translation.zh: 好的 有新的命令 带他们去大使馆

translation.en: FBI is involved. Apparently, there's some security risk.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局介入了 显然有安全风险

translation.en: Take care of it.
translation.zh: 处理好

translation.en: Oh, you two have a secret code now, a secret language.
translation.zh: 噢 你们俩现在有暗号了 密语

translation.en: Is that what's going on? That's... perfect.
translation.zh: 是这样吧？很好

translation.en: -[Leo speaking French] -What does that mean, Leo?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思 利奥？

translation.en: -Duck! -[Ron] What?
translation.zh: -鸭子！-什么…

translation.en: -[guard 3 grunts] -What's happening?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Uh, cancel that. They're legit.
translation.zh: 呃 取消吧 他们没问题

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Where'd you learn that? Did you just kill that guy?
translation.zh: 哪儿学的啊？是不是把那个人弄死了？

translation.en: No, I just crushed his windpipe a little.
translation.zh: 没有 只是把他的气管打碎了一点

translation.en: He'll be fine with immediate medical attention.
translation.zh: 立即进行医疗救治就不会有事

translation.en: "Crushed his wind pi--" Have you ever killed anyone?
translation.zh: 把他的气管打碎… 你杀过人吗？

translation.en: No! Our paramilitary training taught us how to neutralize a target
translation.zh: 没有！我们的准军事训练

translation.en: in under four seconds using mostly non-fatal tactics.
translation.zh: 教会我们使用最不致命的战术在四秒内消灭目标

translation.en: "Paramilitary training"? "Non-fatal"?
translation.zh: 准军事训练？非致命…

translation.en: You made me open up a jar of mustard for you last week. You faked it!
translation.zh: 你上周让我帮你开芥末瓶 你装的！

translation.en: -I faked it. -Oh my God. Is our whole life a lie?
translation.zh: -我装的-天哪！我们所有的生活是谎言吗？

translation.en: -What do we... What do we... What... -[Margot panting]
translation.zh: 咱们怎么办？

translation.en: Who did I marry?
translation.zh: 我娶了什么人啊？

translation.en: Is that Clancy?
translation.zh: 是克兰西吗？

translation.en: Sounds like Clancy.
translation.zh: 听起来像克兰西

translation.en: Clancy.
translation.zh: 克兰西

translation.en: [Margot] Kids, stay there. I'm coming for you.
translation.zh: -妈？-孩子们 别动 我来了

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Is this what Mom does when we're asleep?
translation.zh: 咱们睡着后妈妈就是干这个？

translation.en: Oh... knock it off!
translation.zh: 好的 别打了！

translation.en: -Dad does not look good. -Nuh-uh.
translation.zh: 爸爸情况不妙

translation.en: Oh my God, she looks amazing!
translation.zh: 天哪！她看起来太棒了！

translation.en: There's a guy there.
translation.zh: 那边有人来了

translation.en: Make way! Move!
translation.zh: 让开！

translation.en: -Crown. Get the-- -[man screams]
translation.zh: 王冠 上

translation.en: Come on, jump!
translation.zh: 来 跳！

translation.en: -Clancy. -Hi.
translation.zh: -克兰西-你好

translation.en: We gotta get outta here.
translation.zh: 咱们得离开这里

translation.en: -Come on! -[Ron] How did you guys get here?
translation.zh: 走！你们怎么进来的？

translation.en: -[overlapping voices] -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Is that gonna be my car? Can I learn to drive?
translation.zh: 我们找到了芬奇太太留在桌子上的暗号

translation.en: [Mim] So great. Then we found a secret hideout. [Kevin] Then, Jay tracked you with your GPS chip.
translation.zh: -我们找到了她的秘密藏身处-然后 杰伊用你的定位芯片找到了你

translation.en: [Margot] Kids, I'm sorry I got you involved in all this.
translation.zh: 孩子们 真的很抱歉把你们牵涉了进来

translation.en: No, Mom. I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.zh: 不 妈妈 我对你说的那些话 很抱歉

translation.en: You're not pathetic, you're amazing, and I know you might miss your old life,
translation.zh: 你不可悲 你太棒了我知道你可能想念以前的生活

translation.en: but we had to find you and try and get you back. Just please don't go.
translation.zh: 但是我们得找到你想办法把你找回来 请不要走

translation.en: Honey, I would never leave you!
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我永远不会离开你！

translation.en: Hey, old friend.
translation.zh: 你好 老朋友

translation.en: Looks like your grand plan worked. Here I am. And I…
translation.zh: 看来你的伟大计划成功了 我来了

translation.en: pulled a twofer.
translation.zh: 而且买一送一

translation.en: Course you did.
translation.zh: 这才像你嘛

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Ron] Sorry, do we know her?
translation.zh: -对-不好意思 咱们认识她吗？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, she's a good guy. Well, kind of a bad guy.
translation.zh: 噢 对 放心 她是好人呃 她有点算坏人

translation.en: She's a good bad guy.
translation.zh: 她是好的坏人

translation.en: -We should go. -Go.
translation.zh: -咱们该走了-走

translation.en: I'm gonna keep 'em busy, erase all the footage…
translation.zh: 我会拖住他们 把监视录像都删掉

translation.en: Hey, you. No, no, no. Hand over the Rolex.
translation.zh: 哎 你别走 劳力士给我

translation.en: You have, like, a thousand.
translation.zh: 你有一千个

translation.en: Thank you, good bad guy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 好的坏人

translation.en: Thank you. I knew you'd know what to do.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我知道你会知道该怎么做

translation.en: Yeah. I was ready. I just never pictured it with… kids.
translation.zh: 对 我准备好了只是没想到来的是孩子

translation.en: -Yeah. -Your kids. But… I kind of like it.
translation.zh: -对-你的孩子 不过我挺喜欢的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You live here? In downtown?
translation.zh: 你住在这里？市中心？

translation.en: It's actually more of a safe house that I keep for emergencies, but, yeah.
translation.zh: 更像是我紧急时候使用的安全屋

translation.en: [Kevin] That's so cool! Dad, isn't that cool?
translation.zh: 好酷啊！爸 很酷吧？

translation.en: Eh, is it cool? Or is it fiscally irresponsible?
translation.zh: 酷吗？还是在财务上不负责任？

translation.en: You know, because rent downtown is very expensive, son.
translation.zh: 市中心的租金很贵 孩子 所以…

translation.en: Hey, thanks for sittin' on the towel, bud.
translation.zh: 哎 谢谢你在毛巾上拉屎 兄弟

translation.en: I appreciate you not getting vomit on the Corinthian leather.
translation.zh: 谢谢你没有吐在皮座椅上你懂的 是吧？

translation.en: -You understand, right? -Yeah, I understand, Leo.
translation.zh: 谢谢你没有吐在皮座椅上你懂的 是吧？ 对 我懂 利奥

translation.en: Honey, how's your arm? What happened?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你的手臂还好吧？怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. It was a blur.
translation.zh: 噢 不知道 有点模糊了

translation.en: Lot of fists were flying around. And I think I punched a couple of guys.
translation.zh: 很多拳头打来打去我应该打了几个人

translation.en: Uh, I mean... I think that may have happened when you fell down, awkwardly.
translation.zh: 可能尴尬地摔倒时会出现这种情况

translation.en: -Probably only a bruise. -I think it's a bit more than a bruise.
translation.zh: 大概只是淤伤 应该比淤伤要厉害一点 利奥

translation.en: -Uh, maybe like a funny bone. -Nah, I don't think it's a funny bone.
translation.zh: 可能是骨头麻了 应该不是骨头麻了

translation.en: Uh, you know. -Uh-huh. -[Leo] OK, well, you know.
translation.zh: -好吧-好吧

translation.en: -I mean... -[Ron] Agree to disagree.
translation.zh: 求同存异

translation.en: Actually, I'm gettin' a bit numb, so it's probably gonna affect my work.
translation.zh: 说实话 有点麻了 大概会影响工作

translation.en: Oh. Uh, you're a surgeon?
translation.zh: 噢 你是外科医生吗？

translation.en: No, Leo. I am…
translation.zh: 不是 利奥 我是糕点主厨我需要手指的力量和灵活

translation.en: a pastry chef, and I need my finger strength and dexterity, so there you go.
translation.zh: 不是 利奥 我是糕点主厨我需要手指的力量和灵活 这样啊

translation.en: Is that a real Capicchioni?
translation.zh: 那是真的卡比乔尼的琴吗？

translation.en: -[Margot] We're all safe. -You know that. [laughs] Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.en: -[Clancy] Can you play? -[Leo] Sure.
translation.zh: -你能弹一下吗？-没问题

translation.en: There he goes, exposing more flesh. Who is he doing that for?
translation.zh: 他又来了 露出更多肉 他露给谁看啊？

translation.en: His arms are like Popeye's. It's unbelievable.
translation.zh: 他的手臂像大力水手一样 不可思议

translation.en: Alright.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I activated emergency protocol. We're all safe now.
translation.zh: 我激活了紧急情况流程 咱们现在都安全了只要等着亨利来联系我就行

translation.en: Just have to wait for Henry to contact me.
translation.zh: 咱们现在都安全了只要等着亨利来联系我就行

translation.en: How much is this worth, anyway?
translation.zh: 对了 这东西值多少钱？

translation.en: I'd say somewhere in the ballpark of 20 million.
translation.zh: 大概2000万

translation.en: [Kevin] Crazy! Twenty million?
translation.zh: 太离谱了 2000万？

translation.en: We're giving it back. It doesn't belong to us.
translation.zh: 咱们要还回去 这不属于我们

translation.en: But, Mom, you used to steal stuff all the time when you were younger.
translation.zh: 但是 妈妈 你年轻时经常偷东西

translation.en: -It was pretty cool. -No.
translation.zh: -很酷啊-不行

translation.en: Why can't we just say we lost it or something?
translation.zh: 咱们不能说弄丢了吗？

translation.en: Kev, listen to me. I was wrong.
translation.zh: 凯文 听我说 我以前的做法是错的

translation.en: I paid a hefty price for it. And now, it's put the people I love in danger.
translation.zh: 我为此付出了巨大的代价现在 也使我爱的人有了危险

translation.en: OK? I don't ever want any of you guys doing anything I did.
translation.zh: 我不希望你们任何人走我的老路

translation.en: I made a lot of bad choices, and hurt a lot of people.
translation.zh: 我以前作了许多不好的选择伤害了许多人

translation.en: And we really regret it. Don't we, Leo?
translation.zh: 我们真的很后悔 是吧 利奥？

translation.en: Well, eh…
translation.zh: 呃

translation.en: Of course, we do. We had to go into witness protection to escape Jean-Paul.
translation.zh: 当然后悔咱们不得不进入证人保护计划 才能摆脱尚保罗

translation.en: Well, actually, you went into witness protection.
translation.zh: 其实是你进入了证人保护计划

translation.en: I just couldn't get on board with that.
translation.zh: 而我却做不到而且尚保罗已经进了监狱

translation.en: With Jean-Paul away in prison, which I have you to thank for,
translation.zh: 而我却做不到而且尚保罗已经进了监狱 幸亏你

translation.en: there was an opening for a new Head of Operations.
translation.zh: 行动首领的位子空了出来

translation.en: -Mom, what's going on? Who is that? -[Leo] You remember Elise?
translation.zh: -妈妈 怎么回事？这是谁？-还记得爱丽丝吗？

translation.en: She's with me. I sent her to get you.
translation.zh: 她和我一起的 我派她去找你的

translation.en: Oh! OK, I knew it. [laughs]
translation.zh: 噢 好的 我早就知道了

translation.en: I knew he was a bad guy. Well, how about this?
translation.zh: 我早就知道他是坏人 这样吧？

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 这样吧？

translation.en: How about that on your Corinthian leather?
translation.zh: 在你的皮座椅上蹭蹭

translation.en: That's not cool, Ron.
translation.zh: 这样不好 罗恩

translation.en: You're not cool.
translation.zh: 你不好

translation.en: After we found you this time,
translation.zh: 在这个小肉球和他的视频的帮助下

translation.en: with the help of that little meatball and his video--
translation.zh: 在这个小肉球和他的视频的帮助下 我们找到了你

translation.en: Hey! Don't call my brother a meatball.
translation.zh: 哎！别叫我弟弟肉球

translation.en: I knew the only way I was going to get you to help me steal the crown
translation.zh: 我知道能让你帮我偷王冠的唯一办法

translation.en: was if you thought our lives were in danger.
translation.zh: 是让你以为这与咱们性命攸关

translation.en: Your moral compass, always getting in the way of us having a good time.
translation.zh: 你的道德感 一直在妨碍咱们

translation.en: -So you never went into protection. -[Leo] No.
translation.zh: 你根本没有进入证人保护计划 是的 拜托 承认吧

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Leo] I mean, come on, admit it.
translation.zh: 是的 拜托 承认吧

translation.en: You must be bored out of your mind. Driving carpool, going to Costco.
translation.zh: 你一定觉得无聊透顶了开共乘车道 去好事多

translation.en: You're happy with Strawberry Shortcake? No offense, Ron.
translation.zh: 告诉我 你和这草莓蛋糕一起很满意 无意冒犯 罗恩

translation.en: -Offense taken, Leo. -You can't talk to our dad like that.
translation.zh: -冒犯到我了 利奥-你不能这样对我们爸爸说话

translation.en: The plan was simple in the beginning.
translation.zh: 计划一开始很简单

translation.en: Get you to help steal the crown, frame you for it, then we disappear.
translation.zh: 让你帮忙偷王冠嫁祸给你 然后我们消失

translation.en: But admit it…
translation.zh: 但是承认吧

translation.en: you had fun.
translation.zh: 你很享受

translation.en: Spark's still there. Come with me.
translation.zh: 火花还在 跟我走吧

translation.en: What's it gonna be, Mathilde?
translation.zh: 怎么样 玛蒂尔德？

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Spark is still there.
translation.zh: 火花确实还在

translation.en: And the name is Margot.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫玛戈特

translation.en: How about that, Leo? Margot and Ron.
translation.zh: 怎么样 利奥？玛戈特和罗恩在一起

translation.en: -Right? Like a power couple. Like Rargot. -Gross.
translation.zh: -是吧？就像超级情侣 简称罗格特-恶心

translation.en: -We could be Rargot or Maron. -Meet me at the dock when it's done.
translation.zh: -可以简称罗格特或者玛罗恩-好了之后到码头找我

translation.en: Baxter will have the boat ready.
translation.zh: 巴克斯特会把船准备好

translation.en: I believe this belongs to me.
translation.zh: 这应该是我的

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I guess this is goodbye, Mathi...
translation.zh: 看来要说再见了 玛蒂…

translation.en: Margot.
translation.zh: 玛戈特

translation.en: Have fun explaining this to the Feds.
translation.zh: 好好给联邦调查局解释吧

translation.en: -[Elise] In the chair. Both of you. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 你 坐下 你们俩都坐下

translation.en: -Yes, is this the police? -[door closes]
translation.zh: 你好 是警察局吗？

translation.en: -[Elise] Yes, I-I'm calling because… -It's OK.
translation.zh: -对 我报警是时因为…-没事的

translation.en: I think I have some information on somebody who's committed a crime.
translation.zh: 有人犯罪了 我有相关信息

translation.en: I think it's a... a couple.
translation.zh: 应该是一对夫妇

translation.en: I mean, it's a man and a woman, and the woman is clearly the ringleader.
translation.zh: 一男一女 那个女的明显是头目

translation.en: Yeah, well, she has blonde hair, blue eyes.
translation.zh: 对 她金发 蓝色眼睛

translation.en: Um, she's wearing a sparkly, awful pink dress.
translation.zh: 穿着闪亮的粉色裙子

translation.en: -[whistles] -And the man is… -What? -[Elise] Um, a mismatched...
translation.zh: -那个男的…-什么？

translation.en: No, the woman is clearly the one who's running the show. Yeah.
translation.zh: 不是 明显是那个女的主导 对

translation.en: [whispers] Rain? Why are you doing rain? It's not--
translation.zh: 你干嘛啊？没有下雨

translation.en: I'm hoping you can get here quickly, because I'm not sure what to do.
translation.zh: 希望你们能尽快赶来 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: No, I'm just a neighbor, I saw them walking in,
translation.zh: 不是 我住在附近 我看见他们走进去

translation.en: I was just minding my own business…
translation.zh: 我在做自己的事…

translation.en: [whispers] What hat? You need a hat?
translation.zh: 帽子？

translation.en: …I would say you should bring everybody possible.
translation.zh: 我建议把人全带来

translation.en: -[whispers] I got it. -[whispers] What?
translation.zh: -我来-来什么？

translation.en: [whispers] I got it.
translation.zh: -我来-整队人都带来

translation.en: -I got this. -[Elise] There's so many.
translation.zh: 他们人好多

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干嘛？

translation.en: -[Margot groans] -[Mim] Mrs. Finch!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: -[Kevin] Yeah! -[Clancy] Mom!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: [Mim] Oh my God. No, no, no. Oh, man!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Mom! Dad, do something!
translation.zh: 天哪！妈妈！爸 帮忙啊！

translation.en: I got it. I got it.
translation.zh: 我来

translation.en: Honey, I-I have the gun. Want me to throw it to you?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我拿到枪了 要扔给你吗？

translation.en: -Shoot her! -What? Shoot her? I...
translation.zh: -打她！-什么？打她？我…

translation.en: I-I-I can't shoot a gun. I've never shot a gun before in my life!
translation.zh: 我不会开枪 我这辈子没开过枪！

translation.en: I could really use some help!
translation.zh: 帮忙啊！

translation.en: -[Elise yelps] -OK, OK, OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: -Hey, are you OK? Are you alright? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-嗯

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Sorry. [gasps] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 对不起 天哪！

translation.en: -[sighs] -I killed someone. I killed somebody.
translation.zh: 我杀人了

translation.en: -[groaning] -[Kevin] Dad, she's moving.
translation.zh: 爸 她在动

translation.en: -[laughs] Yeah, she's moving! -You didn't kill her!
translation.zh: -爸 你没杀人！-对 她在动

translation.en: I didn't kill somebody. Oh, she's waking up.
translation.zh: 我没杀人 我没杀… 噢 她在醒过来了

translation.en: We gotta go before Leo gets away, or this whole thing becomes my mess.
translation.zh: 咱们不能让利奥跑了否则整件事要怪在我头上了

translation.en: -Come on. Let's go! -[Ron] Right, right. Go, go, go.
translation.zh: -走吧-对 出发 出发

translation.en: I can't believe you picked up that spider, Mr. Finch. That was so brave!
translation.zh: 你居然捡起了蜘蛛 芬奇先生 你好勇敢啊！

translation.en: Oh, I don't know about brave, Lewis. And I knew it was harmless.
translation.zh: 是不是勇敢我就不知道了 路易斯 不过我知道那只蜘蛛无害

translation.en: Harmless? That was a wolf spider, one of the most poisonous in the world.
translation.zh: 无害？是狼蛛 世界上最毒的之一

translation.en: It had an egg sac on its back, too, which is, like, millions of poison babies.
translation.zh: 背上还有卵囊是数以百万计的毒宝宝

translation.en: Mom, no, no. This isn't our car.
translation.zh: 妈 不对 这不是我们的车

translation.en: Oh my God, she's hot-wiring that car.
translation.zh: 天哪！她在搭线启动

translation.en: -[Clancy] Mom, you can hot-wire a car? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 妈 你会搭线启动汽车？

translation.en: Teach us to do that!
translation.zh: 教我们啊！

translation.en: No! You should never do this.
translation.zh: 不！你们永远不要做这种事

translation.en: OK, what if our phones are dead, there's a zombie apocalypse,
translation.zh: 好的 如果我们的手机都用不了而且出现了僵尸末日

translation.en: there's a virus going around, then, can you--
translation.zh: 还有病毒在传播

translation.en: -[all] Kevin! -[groans]
translation.zh: -你能不能教我们…-凯文！

translation.en: Look, guys! Look, it's Leo.
translation.zh: 看 是利奥！

translation.en: -[Ron] There he is! -[engine revving]
translation.zh: 亲爱的 快点

translation.en: -[engine starts] -[Kevin] My God, Mom!
translation.zh: 天哪！妈妈！

translation.en: We got it. Come on, get in!
translation.zh: 好了 快上车！

translation.en: -Hey, honey! -Yeah?
translation.zh: -来吧 嗯？-哎 亲爱的

translation.en: -Leo was wrong about one thing. -What?
translation.zh: -利奥有一件事说对了-什么事？

translation.en: I'm the one who drives carpool.
translation.zh: 我经常开共乘车道

translation.en: Yeah, you are.
translation.zh: 好的 来吧

translation.en: You got this!
translation.zh: 你行的！

translation.en: [Ron] Let's save our family.
translation.zh: 咱们去拯救咱们的家庭

translation.en: -Look at this! This is limited edition! -Alright.
translation.zh: -看看 这是限量版！-好的

translation.en: -Heated seats! -[Margot] Belts on.
translation.zh: -还有座椅加热！-系好安全带

translation.en: Nice, this is so nice.
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: -[Margot] Focus. We gotta go. -Here we go.
translation.zh: -咱们得出发了-出发

translation.en: -Sorry, I'm sorry. -Dad!
translation.zh: -抱歉 我…-爸！

translation.en: -[Mim] No! Mr. Finch! -The adrenaline pumping.
translation.zh: -别说了 芬奇先生！-肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: -[Clancy] Go! -[Margot] Honey, drive!
translation.zh: -出发！-亲爱的 开吧！

translation.en: [Ron] Here we go!
translation.zh: -开吧 爸！-出发！

translation.en: Oh, wow, this handles great!
translation.zh: 哇 真好开！

translation.en: Oh! This thing's got some pickup!
translation.zh: -这辆车很有力气啊！-太好了

translation.en: [sings] Limited edition!
translation.zh: -限量版！-嗯

translation.en: [Margot] There he is!
translation.zh: -要不…-他在那里！

translation.en: He's going left!
translation.zh: 左转！

translation.en: This is an adrenaline rush for sure. [laughs]
translation.zh: -没问题-确实是肾上腺素激增

translation.en: You're doing great, honey.
translation.zh: 你开得很好 亲爱的

translation.en: [Ron] Oh! See how I took that turn?
translation.zh: 看到我转向了吗？

translation.en: [Margot] Cut the curb. Don't swerve so big.
translation.zh: 压马路牙子 不用拐这么大 亲爱的

translation.en: Dad! What now?
translation.zh: 爸 怎么办？

translation.en: What? I don't know. I hadn't thought that far in advance, pal!
translation.zh: 怎么办？不知道 我没想这么远！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么啊？

translation.en: -Dad, I have an idea. -What?
translation.zh: -爸 我有一个办法-什么？

translation.en: This is a laser pen. Maybe I could--
translation.zh: 这是激光笔 要不我…

translation.en: What are you doing with a laser pen?
translation.zh: 你要激光笔干嘛？

translation.en: -[Mim screams] -Oh, man!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [Mim screams] What is happening?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, no, I don't think that came from us.
translation.zh: 应该不是我们弄的

translation.en: That was us!
translation.zh: 是我们弄的！

translation.en: -That was us. -We'll leave a note.
translation.zh: -是我们弄的-咱们留个条子

translation.en: OK. Here we go. I got him.
translation.zh: 好的 来了 我追上他了

translation.en: Ron, watch out!
translation.zh: 罗恩 小心！

translation.en: We are all going to die.
translation.zh: 咱们都要死了

translation.en: -Roll down the window. I have an idea! -What? OK.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 摇下车窗-什么？ -我有个办法-好的

translation.en: Hey! Hey, Leo!
translation.zh: 哎 利奥！

translation.en: Leo! You wanna dance with the minivan, man?
translation.zh: 利奥 想和面包车跳舞吗？

translation.en: Well, check out this side-impact safety!
translation.zh: 看看侧面撞击安全性！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么啊？

translation.en: [Ron] Everybody's OK? OK.
translation.zh: 大家没事吧？好的

translation.en: I got Leo! You get the kids!
translation.zh: 我去追利奥 你看着孩子们

translation.en: -Uh, everyone OK? -[kids] Yeah.
translation.zh: -大家没事吧？-嗯

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 利奥

translation.en: I got him, honey. I got him.
translation.zh: 我追到他了 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, any excuse to whip out the guns, right?
translation.zh: 有借口拔枪吧？

translation.en: -Uh... -[Clancy] Mom?
translation.zh: -妈-嗯？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Dad might need you more than we do. I think you're right.
translation.zh: -我想爸更需要你-没错

translation.en: [groans] Why are your fingers so freakishly strong?
